GK16andhvc1u:8: --- śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptakṛtaṃ locanam śrībhāratyai namaḥ apūrvaṃ yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalāṃ- jagadbhāvaprakhyaṃ nijarasabharātsārayati ca /
GK16andhvc1u:9: kramātprakhyopākhyāprasarasubhagaṃ bhāsayati ta- tsarasvatyāstattvaṃ kavisahṛdayākhyaṃ vijayate //
GK16andhvc1u:10: śrīsahṛdayatilakarāmaśārakakṛtabālapriy.ā śrīgurave namaḥ śrīgurūnpūrṇavedeśaṃ saṅgameśañca mādhavam /
GK16andhvc1u:24: bālapriyā nā-tattatkāryaṃ prati prasiddhaṃ yadyadupādānādikāraṇantasya kalā leśaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:27: kiñca yad grāvaprakhyaṃupāṣāṇatulyaṃ nisargato nīrasaṃ jagatusarvaṃ vastu nijaḥ svīyaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:28: kāvyāsambandhī yo rasaḥ śṛṅgarādiḥ tasya bharādatiśayāt sārayati sāraṃ karoti vibhāvāditvayojanena
GK16andhvc1u:34: upākhyā vacanaṃ prathamaṃ prakhyā paścādupākhyeti tayoryaḥ kramātprasaraḥ tena subhagaṃ hṛdyaṃ sad,
GK16andhvc1u:35: bhāsayati nisargeṇāramaṇīyamapi sarvaṃ vastu rasavyañjakatvasampadanena rasaṇīyaṃ satprakāśayatītyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:37: atra prakhyopākhyāprasarasyāpūrvavastunirmāṇe sarasatvakaraṇe ca hetutvamārthikaṃ bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:38: atrādyena vākyenāpūrvavastuno nirmāṇandvitīyena pūrvaṃ sato vastunassarasatvakaraṇaṃ tṛtīyena dvayorapi hṛdyatayā prakāśanañjoktamityapa vyācikṣate,
GK16andhvc1u:44: atha vā kavisahṛdayayorākhyā abhīkṣṇyena khyānaṃ sphuraṇaṃ yasya tat kāvyātmakamityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:51: vijayate; apūrvamityādyarthaḥ pūrvavadbodhya iti pratipādyārtho 'pyāsūtrita iti dik /
GK16andhvc1u:52: athauddhatyaṃ paraharannātmano vyākhyānanaipuṇī darśayan kīrttya nuvṛttaye nāmanirdeśaṅkurvaṃśca pratijānīte-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:53: bhaṭṭendurājasyautannāmakasya guroḥ caraṇābjayoḥupajhatulyayoḥ pādayoḥ tatsannidhāviti yāvad yo 'dhivāsastena caraṇābjaśuśrūṣayeti yāvad;
GK16andhvc1u:55: atha ca śrotṛjanahṛdayapriyāṇi śrutāni śāstrāṇi yasya saḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:56: yathā padmena surabhīkaraṇe vastuno hṛdyatvaṃ tathetyupamātra dhvanyate,
GK16andhvc1u:60: apiśabdaḥ svalpābhidhānena saha sphuṭīkaraṇasyāpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati,
GK16andhvc1u:64: lojyate dṛśyate 'neneti locanaṃ svasya locanaṃmanaḥ tasya nitarāṃ yojanayā manaḥpraṇidhānenetyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:66: yadvā svasya locanaṃ jñānaṃ tasya niyojanayā vyākhyānarūpānuraṇanadvārā samarpaṇena sphuṭayāmi prakāśayāmi,
GK16andhvc1u:71: namaskāraḥ tasya sampattiḥuprakarṣaḥ tayā caritaḥulabdhaḥ arthaḥuvighnanivṛttyādirūpasākṣātprayojanaṃ yasya saḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:75: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ vyākhyānaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ śravaṇañcabhīṣṭaṃ divyāñajanākhyā ṭippanī śrīśrīgaurakṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:80: locanākhye vyākhyāne viṣamasthalāni mukhyatvena viśadayitukāmasya divyāñjananāmikeyaṃ ṭippanī;
GK16andhvc1u:86: pūrṇaitatsūtrānuvṛttita ṛtpadānuvṛttyaiva nirvāhe prakṛtasūtre punā ṛdgrahaṇamānaṅvidhyu
GK16andhvc1u:100: nityodyoginaśca bhagavato 'sammohādyavasāyayogitvenotsāhapratītervīraraso bālapriyā vaṇañcābhīṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya sampattaye niṣpattaye,
GK16andhvc1u:101: tadubhayasampattau tadubhayahetukagranthapratiṣcaṭārūpaṃ phalaṃ granthakārasya ca siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:106: yadvā samucitāyā āśiṣaḥ prakaṭanaṃugranthato nibandhanaṃ taddvāreṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:108: vṛttikāra ityanena svecchetyādikaṃ na kārikārūpasūtrādyapadyamiti darśitam,
GK16andhvc1u:120: atha dhvaniṃ kāvyātmānaṃ ṭippanī vṛttikāra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:122: ata eva viśiṣṭasyevāripsitatvena mūle maṅgalākaroṇe 'pi nācāravirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:123: ke cittu mūle 'pi “kāvyasyātme' tiprathamakārikāyāmādyapadasya kāvyetyasyānyaparatve 'pi parārthopanītodakumbhadarśanavat śravaṇamātreṇāpi;
GK16andhvc1u:125: śabdamūrttidharasyaite viṣṇoraṃśā mahātmana“-- ityādipramāṇato bhagavatsphorakatvena vastunirddeśarūpamaṅgalaṃ jātamevetyāpi vadanti,
GK16andhvc1u:129: nakhānāṃ praharaṇatvena graharaṇena ca rakṣaṇe kartavye nakhānāmavyatiriktatvena karaṇatvātsātiśayaśaktitā kartṛtvena sūcitā,
GK16andhvc1u:135: bālapriyā pratipādayiṣyatā granthakṛtā kṛtasyāsya prathamapadyasya kāvyarūpatvādasminnapi
GK16andhvc1u:136: dhvaniryojanīya iti manvāno rasādibhedena trividheṣu dhvaniṣu pradhānabhūtaṃ rasadhvanimādau
GK16andhvc1u:139: na vācyārthamātramanenocyate kintu raso dhvanyate cetyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:143: yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ etadevaṃ kartuṃ śakyamiti vastutattvaniścayaḥ tadyogitveneti utsāhahetukathanam,
GK16andhvc1u:146: svecchākesariṇo madhuripoḥ prasannārticchida iti padairhiraṇyakaśipuprabhṛtinivarhaṇādiviṣayakotsāhasya vyañjanayā sahṛdayānāṃ pratīterityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:151: nanu nakhānāṃ praharaṇatve 'pi kathaṃ trāṇakriyāṃ prati karaṇatvamityatastatsambhāvanāndarśayati-praharaṇeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:152: praharaṇaṃ hi svasyānyasya vā rakṣāṃ kartumupādīyata iti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:163: vibhāvādīnāṃ mitho nāntarīyakatvena “sadbhāvaśced vibhāvāderdvayorekasya vā bhaved /
GK16andhvc1u:172: ārteḥ punaśchedyatvaṃ nakhānparatyasambhāvanīyamapi tadīyānāṃ nakhānāṃsvecchānirmāṇaucityātsambhāvyata eveti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:173: atha vā trijagatkaṇṭako hiraṇyakaśipurviśvasyotkleśakara iti sa eva vastutaḥ prapannānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:176: kiṃ ca te nakhāḥ svacchena svacchatāguṇena nairmalyena;
GK16andhvc1u:177: svacchamṛdugrabhṛtayo bālapriyā śaktiḥusāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvastattā,
GK16andhvc1u:184: tattaddurjanebhyo jagato yastrāsaḥ tadapasāraṇe ya udyamaḥ sa ityarthaḥ, ukta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:186: imamarthaṃ manasikṛtya pūrvaṃ nityodyogina ityuktamiti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:188: ādyamicchāpadena dvitīyaṃ svapadena ca gamyamiti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:193: ucitetīcchāviśeṣaṇaṃ vā tasmin yadaucityāmarthāt svasya tasmāddhetorityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:204: svecchayā bhagavata icchayā yannirmāṇaṃunakhānāṃnarmāṇaṃ tena hetunā;
GK16andhvc1u:209: asmin pakṣe ātiṃśabda ātiṅkāraṇaṃlakṣayati tasyāvyabhiṭacāreṇa nikhilārtikāritvañca dhvanatīti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:213: tathāvidhasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ hananamārterevocchedanaṃ na tu kasya citprāṇina iti bhagavadbuddhiriti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:216: ārtimeva chinatti na tu kañjitprāṇinamityarthapratītyeti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:217: atra prapannetyādiviśeṣaṇaṃ trāṇāśīravādahetugarbhasvacchetyādipraśaṃsāparaṃpraśasyamānā hi devatā praseduṣī prepsitaṃ prayacchati,
GK16andhvc1u:228: naraharinakhānāṃ tacca lokottareṇa rūpema pratipāditam kiṃ ca tadīyāṃ svacchatāṃ kuṭilimānaṃ cāvalokya bālacandraḥ svātmani khedamanubhavati;
GK16andhvc1u:232: adya bālapriyā vakrahṛdyarūpākṛtyāyāsitatvasya bālacandra eva sambhavāttadarthasāmarthyamūlenetyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:246: tadhā ca vidāraṇādinā'yākasakāribhyo lokikanakhebhyo naraharinakānāṃ vāyatireko vyajyata iti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:247: prapannārticchida iti viśeṣaṇasahakāreṇa vyātirekāntarasyālaṅkārāntarasya ca dhvanindarśayati kitrcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:254: itiśabdasyānubhavatītyanena vyatirekālaṅkāra ityanena ca sambandho vodhyaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:261: ātmano hi santāpasyaiva cchedane kuśalatvaṃ na sarvāsāmārtīnāmiti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:263: ete nakhāḥ na kintu bālendava iti bahumatyetyarthaḥ, āyāsamita /
GK16andhvc1u:267: utprekṣāpahnutidhvaniriti utparekṣārthāpahnutirutprekṣāpahnutiḥ tasyāḥ dhvaniḥ pahnutyutprekṣayoraṅgāṅgitayā sthitatvāttatsaṅkaradhvaniriti
GK16andhvc1u:270: śaktiḥ padaparivṛttisahatvarūpasāmarthyaṃ mūlaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tāddaśena svataḥsambhavinā vyañjanāvyāpāreṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:275: locanam punarevaṃvidhā nakhā daśa bālacandrākārāḥsantāpārticchedakuśalāśceti tāneva loko bālendubahumānena paśyati,
GK16andhvc1u:278: bālapriyā bālenduraviratamāyāsamanubhavatīvetyutprekṣāyāṃ hi pūrvoktaṃ tāneva lokobālenduṃ bahumānena paśyati na tu māmityākalanaṃ nimittaṃ tatra ca spaṣṭāpahnutiḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:279: na nakhā ete kintu bālendava iti lokasya pratīteḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:286: vāsyamidaṃ na bhāvaparaṃ bhaktasya bhedena bhajanīyadevatāviṣayakaratervyaṅgyāyāḥ khalubhāvatvam,
GK16andhvc1u:294: na ca nairapekṣye saṃsṛṣṭeḥ prasaṅga iti saṅkyam?
GK16andhvc1u:298: yadyapi sarvameva vastu tathāpīha rasālaṅkārabhinnaṃ vastupadena vivakṣitam,
GK16andhvc1u:304: kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti budhair yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvas tasyābhāvaṃ jagadur apare bhāktam āhus tam anye /
GK16andhvc1u:305: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
GK16andhvc1u:306: kāvyasyātmā dhvaniriti budhairyaḥ samāmnātapūrvastasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare bhāktamāhustamanye /
GK16andhvc1u:307: ke cidvācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye tattvamūcustadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye tatsvarūpam // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:308: locanam atha prādhānyenābhidheyasvarūpamabhidadhadapradhānatayā prayojanaprayojanaṃ tatsambaddhaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sāmarthyātprakaṭayannādivākyamāha-kāvyasyātmeti
GK16andhvc1u:325: evañja tayorhetuhetumadbhāvena prayojanaprayojanarūpāyāḥ prīterabhidhānāttaddhetubhūtasya dhvanisvarūpajñānasya prakaṭanaṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:326: nanu budhaśabdasya sāmānyato jñātṛvācitvāt vṛttau 'kāvyatattvavidbhiri'ti kuto vyākhyātamityatastadavatārayati-kāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:336: asya ca sahṛdayamanaḥprītistaditi bhavati tadabhidhānasya tāddaśaprītistathā prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:337: prayojanaprayojanatāvacchedakakukṣau manaḥpadopādānaṃ ca bharatadarśanādhvanīnānāṃ prakriyāṃśe bhūmnā vyākaramadarśanānusāritvasphoraṇāya,
GK16andhvc1u:338: idamīye hi darśane sukhādiviśeṣaguṇānāṃ manoniṣṭatvamevābhimataṃ nātmaniṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:343: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnātapūrvaḥ samyak āsamantād mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:344: tasya sahṛdayajanamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpyabhāvamanye locanam ātmaśabdasya tattvaśabdenārthaṃ vivṛṇvānaḥ sāratvamaparaśābdavailakṣamyakāritvaṃ ca darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:358: tena cābādhitasvarūpatvarūpātmasāmyena dhvanirūpārtho lakṣyata iti jñāpanāya tattvaśabdena tadarthaviviraṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:366: tatsaṃjñāprakāreṇa saṃjñino bhānañjākṣepādinā bhavati yathā jātisaktipakṣe vyakterbhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:367: yadvā dhvanipadasya lakṣaṇayā dhvanisaṃjñita ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:378: nanvevaṃ dhvaniśabdasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakathane sati tasya 'sahṛdayamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpī'ti samanantaragranthavirodhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:390: locanam evaṃ tu yuktataram--itiśabdo bhinnakramo vākyārthaparāmarśakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:392: śabdapadārthakatve hi dhvanisaṃjñito 'rtha iti kā saṅgatiḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:396: pratyuta satyeva dharmiṇi dharmamātrakṛtā vipratipattirityalamaprastutena bhūyasā sahṛdayajanodvejanena /
GK16andhvc1u:401: avicchinnena pravāheṇa tairetaduktaṃ vināpi viśiṣṭapustakeṣu viniveśanādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:402: na ca budhā bhūyāṃso 'nādaraṇāyaṃ bālapriyā yādidaṃ saṃjñāprakāreṇa dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ vastu kāvyātmatvenābhihitaṃ tadaśraddhopahanyamānamānasajanabuddhyanurodhenaiva
GK16andhvc1u:403: dhvanyamānatvaviśiṣṭārthasya sahṛdayapratītisiddhatayā tadbuddhyanurodhena ca samanantaragrantha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:404: yadvā nanvevaṃ dhvanipadasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakatve kathamabhāvādivādipratyutthānam,
GK16andhvc1u:405: teṣāṃ dhvanyamānatva eva vivādena dvanisaṃjñāyāṃ vivādābhāvādityata āha-vastutastvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:411: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ yocajanaṃ vyākyānaṃ veti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:433: yathā śabdādau satyeva dharmiṇi nityatvānityatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:434: prakṛte ca dhvanisaṃjñite dharmiṇi guṇālaṅkārāntarbhūtatvabhāktatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:482: jagaduriti liṭaḥ prayogasyopapattiṃ vṛttau vyācakṣīrannityādestadvivaraṇarūpatvādikañca darśayitumāha-na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:485: yadi na śrutāḥ kathantarhi dūṣayiṣyanta ityata āha-sambhāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:504: evaṃ liṭaḥ prayogaṃ prasādhyācakṣīrannityādiliṅprayogān prakṛtasaṅgatān darśayati-tahyākhyānāyaiveti /
GK16andhvc1u:506: na tu svatantratayetyevakārārthaḥ. vyākhyānāyetyasya sambhāvyetyanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:507: nanvacakṣīrannityādibhireva jagadurityasya vāyakhyāne sambhavati kiṃ madhye tadabhāvavādināñjāmī ityādigranthenetyaśāṅkāvāraṇāyāvatārayati-sambhāvanāpīti
GK16andhvc1u:517: api tu vartamānataiva sphuṭeti vartamānenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:518: nanu cāsambhavadvastumūlayā sambhāvanayā yatsambhāvitaṃ taddūṣayitumaśakyamityāśaṅkyāha--vikalpā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:519: na tu vastu sambhavati tāddak yata iyaṃ sambhāvanā,
GK16andhvc1u:522: ata eva 'ācakṣīran' ityādayo 'tra sambhāvanāviṣayā liṅprayogā atītaparamārthe paryavasyanti /
GK16andhvc1u:530: nanu sambhavantītyasya sthāne sambhāvyanta ityucyatāṃ tadāpratijñā cādau kṛtā syādityatrāha-sambhāvyanta itīti /
GK16andhvc1u:540: vikalpā ityuktyā kathaṃ parihāra ityatastatprakāraṃ vyācaṣṭe-na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:546: pramāṇayuktyābhāsābhyāmadhiṣṭānabhūte kāvyātmani dhvanisvarūpe viruddhatayā kalpyanta iti vikalpāḥ pakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:556: paryavasyantīti mūle jagaduriti liṭyoga iva vṛttāvācakṣīrannityādisambhāvanārthakaliṅprayogo 'pi kriyāyāḥ sambhāvanārūpabuddhyāropitatvanimittkabhūtatve paryavasyatīrtthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:571: kiṃ vṛttaṃ yadi pūrvavanna bhavanasya sambhāvanetyayamevārtha ityalamaprakṛtena bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:572: tatra samayāpekṣamena śabdo 'rthapratipādaka iti kṛtvā vācyavyātiriktaṃ nāsti vyaṅgyam,
GK16andhvc1u:574: tadanākṣiptamapi vā na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ kumārīṣviva bhartṛsukamatadvitsu iti traya evaite pradhānavipratipattiprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:575: tatrābāvavikalpasya trayaḥ prakārāḥ-śabdarthaguṇālaṅkārāṇāmeva śabdorthaśobhākāritvāllokaśāstrātiriktasundaraśabdārthamayasya bālapriyā kāyasya śarīrasya /
GK16andhvc1u:583: yadi nāmetyādipadyasya śeṣabhūtamidamekapādātmakaṃ vākyam-yadi na syāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:585: kintu yathāyathameva vyāvasthitāntarbahirbhāga evāyaṃ kāyassyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:587: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ syādityarthaḥ. tadāpyatijugupsito 'yaṃ koyo niṣphala eva phalgutaraviṣayopabhogamātropayogitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:590: yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvanā kiṃ vṛttamiti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:591: tataḥ kiṃ syādi tyāsya vivaraṇaṃ-kiṃ vṛttamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:592: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ jātaṃ na kiñcidityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:593: yadi na syādityasya vivaraṇaṃ yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:596: ayamevārtha iti niṣedhasthale 'pi liṅassambhāvanaivārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:630: heturayaṃ vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra bodhyaḥ--yatra yatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ tatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:631: tatra tatraśabdārthaguṇādyanyatamatvamiti locanam kāvyasya na śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo
GK16andhvc1u:633: yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo 'sti yo 'smābhirna gaṇita ityekaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:634: yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhākāryeva na bhavatīti dvitīyaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:635: atha śobhākārī bhavati tarhyasmadukta eva guṇe vālaṅkāre vāntarbhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:644: tadyayā-'karmaṇyaṇ' ityatra kumbhakārādyudāharamaṃ śrutvā svayaṃ nagarakārādiśabdā utparekṣyante,
GK16andhvc1u:656: tathā ca paramate pratiyogiprasiddhyā tanniṣedha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:662: nanu vyaṅgyasya śobhākāritvaṃ svasaṃvedasākṣikaṃ kathamapahnūyata ityataḥ prakārāntaramāha- athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:674: asmaduktānāṃ gumādīnāṃ kāvyajīvitatvādiviśeṣamāśritya dhvanyādināmāntaraṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:691: tatra ca śabdagatāścārutvahetavo 'nuprāsādayaḥ locanam tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:693: anyau ca dvauviti pañca vikalpā iti tātparyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:703: saṃghaṭanāparyavasitaṃ tvarthaguṇebhya iti na guṇālaṅkāravyatirikto dhvaniḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:714: tadanatiriktavṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi locanam tathā dhvanirapi tadvyatiriktaśca cārutvahetuśca bhaviṣyatītyasiddho vyatireka ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tadanatiriktavṛttaya iti /
GK16andhvc1u:716: tathā hyanuprāsānāmeva dīptamasṛṇamadhyamavarṇanīyopayogitayā paruṣatvalalitatvamadhyamatvasvarūpavivecanāya vargatrrayasampādanārthaṃ tistro 'nuprāsajātayo vṛttaya ityuktāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:720: 'śabdārthaśarīram' ityādeḥ 'pratīyanta' ityantasya vṛttigranthasya sārārthaṃ vyākhyāyottaragranthaṃ prakṛtopayogaṃ darsayannavatārayati-nanvityādi
GK16andhvc1u:723: taccārutvakāri neti vyatirekavyāpterguṇālaṅkāravyatiriktāsu cārutvahetutyā sampratipannāsu vṛttirītiṣu vyabhicārādasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:740: vivariṣyate cedamupari. vṛttaya ityuktāḥ vṛttaya iti vyavahṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:756: tatra tṛtīyaḥ komalānuprāsa iti vṛttayo 'nuprāsajātaya eva /
GK16andhvc1u:759: pṛthakpṛthak sarūpāṇāṃ sajātīyānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nyāsaḥ upanibandhaḥ tam /
GK16andhvc1u:769: paruṣānuprāsaḥ masṛṇānuprāsa iti pāṭhastu anuprāsavṛtyoraikyābhiprāyeṇa yojyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:781: anena grāmyāyā vṛtteḥ rūḍhā komalasaṃjñā ca bhaṭṭodbhaṭoktā darśitā /
GK16andhvc1u:785: locanam jātau jātimato vartamānatvaṃ na syāt,
GK16andhvc1u:787: yathāha kaścit-- lokottare hi gāmbhīrye vartante pṛthivībhujaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:790: ata eva vyāpārabhedābhāvānna pṛthaganumeyasvarūpā apīti vṛttiśabdasya vyāpāravācino 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:792: udbhaṭādibhiḥ prayukte 'pi tasminnārthaḥ kaścodadhiko hṛdayapathamavatīrṇa ityabhiprāyeṇāha--gatāḥ avaṇagocaramiti /
GK16andhvc1u:793: bālapriyā śaṣāditattadvarṇaracanārūpāḥ paruṣādyā vṛttayo vastuto 'nuprāseṣu vartante /
GK16andhvc1u:796: yathā--gotvādijātayā gavādibiḥ. ataśca svāśrayābhivyaṅgyatvasāmyādvṛttīnāṃ jātitvopacāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:803: tarhi tatra vartanaṃ kinnāmetyata āha--tadanugraha eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:804: vṛttirūpajātikartṛkānugraha evetyartha. sa ca tatkartṛkaṃ bhedakadharmasamarpaṇaṃ rasābhivyañjanasāmarthyādhānaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:810: nāstyatiriktā vṛttirvyāpāro yāsāṃ tā ityārthakatayā vyācaṣṭe-nābhyadhiketi /
GK16andhvc1u:812: sa eva vṛttīnāmapīti bhāvaḥ. tadanatiriktā ityanuktvā evamukteḥ phalandaśayati-ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:818: anuprāsābhyadhikavyāpārasattve tu vṛttīnāṃ svarūpaṃ pṛthagabhidheyaṃ syāditi tadbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:831: teṣāṃ ca samucitavṛttyarpaṇe yadanyonyamelanakṣamatvena pānaka iva guḍamaricādirasānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:855: tathā ca mādhuryādiguṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ prātisvalikarūpeṇa rītiśabdavācyatvaṃ nāsti,
GK16andhvc1u:858: gauḍavidarbhapāñcālasambāndhano gauḍīyādayo ye desāsteṣāṃ tatratyākavīnāmiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:864: trividhamityanena rītigatamapi gauḍīyā vaidarbhī pāñjālīti trevidhyaṃ sūcitam /
GK16andhvc1u:876: prasiddhaprasthānavyatirekiṇaḥ kāvyaprakārasya kāvyatvahāneḥ locanam samudāyino nānya iti vṛttirītayo na gumālaṅkāravyatiriktā iti sthita evāsau vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:882: tathāpyatra dhvaniśabdavācyo na kaścidatirikto 'rtho labhyata iti nāmaśabdenāha /
GK16andhvc1u:896: 'ko 'yami' tyatra kiśabdaḥ kimeṣa cārutvasthānamuta cārutvaheturiti vikalpaniṣedhaparaścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti-naiṣa ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:901: kiṃśabde naivoktārthe labdhe ki nāmaśabdenetyata āha--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:906: etāvatā śabdārthatadgumālaṅkāravyatiriktasya kāvyaśobhāhetutvaviśiṣṭasya dhvanerabhāva eva siddhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:907: na tu svarūpeṇa dhvanerabhāva iti tatsiddhye pakṣāntaropakṣepa ityāśayenāvatārayati-nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:924: na ca tatsamayāntaḥpātinaḥ locanam cāsau nṛttagītavādyādisthānīyaḥ kāvyasya kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:930: pratiṣṭante paramparayā vyavaharanti yena mārgeṇa tatprasthānam /
GK16andhvc1u:941: bālapriyā kāvyasya samudāyitayā sambandhitvena hyasau vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:942: na ca guṇādibhyo vyatireke sati kāvyasambandhitvamasya śacakyopapādaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:976: jānantītyanena 'tatsamayāntaḥ pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścidi'ti sahṛdayān kāṃścitparikalpya tatprasidyā dhvanau kāvyavyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakalavidvanmanogrāhitāmavalambate
GK16andhvc1u:977: locanam tadabhimatatvaṃ ca nāma kāvyalakṣaṇamuktaprasthānātirekiṇa eva bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:978: yathā hi khaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ karomītyukatvā ātānavitānātmā prāvriyamāṇaḥ sakaladehācchādakaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:981: paraiḥ paṭaḥ khalvevaṃvidho bhavati na khaṅga ityayuktatāya paryanuyujyamāna evaṃ brūyārt--iddaśā eva khaṅkāṃ sakalaśabdena nirākaroti /
GK16andhvc1u:991: ata eva iti bruvāṇa iti vakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1006: iddaśaḥ padārtha eva mama khaṅgatvenābhipreta ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1015: vidvanmanasāmucita viṣaya eva pravṛttisambhavādvidvatpadena uktābiprāyassūcita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1019: pūnarapare tasyābhāvamanyathā kathayeyuḥ--na sambhavatyeva dhvanirnāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:1021: locanam evaṃ hi kṛte 'pi na kiñcitkṛtaṃ syādunmattatā paraṃ prakaṭiteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1023: jīvitaṃ ca nāma prasiddhaprasthānātiriktamalaṅkārakārairanuktatvāttacca na kāvyamiti loke prasiddhamita /
GK16andhvc1u:1025: yadi hi tatkāvyasyanuprāṇakaṃ tenāṅgīkṛtaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā taccirantanairanuktamiti pratyuta lakṣaṇārhameva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:1028: tathāpi dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamityasau na kenacidukta ityabhiprāyamāśaṅkya tṛtīyamabhāvavādamupanyasyati punarapara iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1031: bālapriyā ko doṣa ityata āha--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1034: parantu unmattataiva prakāśitā syānna tu vidvattetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1055: evamapyasau dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamiti na kenaciduktaḥ dhvaniḥ kāvyātmeti kenāpi lakṣaṇakāreṇa noktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1059: vuño bhāvarthatve cārutvahetvantarbhāvoktiranupapannā syādato vyacaṣṭe-kamanīyasya karmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1064: teṣāmanyatamasyaiva vā apūrvasamākhyāmātrakaraṇe yatkiñcana kathanaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1081: dhvanirdhvanirit vīpsayā sambhramaṃ sūcayannādaraṃ darśayati--nṛtyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1082: tallakṣaṇakṛdbhistadyuktakāvyavidhāyibhistacchravaṇodbhūtacamatkāraiśca bālapriyā 'kiñca vāgvikalpānām' ityādigranthaṃ vyākhyāsyamānaṃ manasikṛtyāvatārayati locanenanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:1084: vividhaṃ chidyanta iti vicchittayaḥ vaicitryāṇi, tāsām /
GK16andhvc1u:1090: 'vāgvikalpānām' ityatra vākpadaṃ nānārthakaṃ vikalpapadaṃ vecitryārthakamiti vyācaṣṭe-vaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1114: sahastraśo hi mahātmabhiranyairalaṅkāraprakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca /
GK16andhvc1u:1117: na tvasya kṣodakṣamaṃ tattvaṃ kiñcidapi prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1118: tathā cānyena kṛta evātra ślokaḥ--- yasminnasti na vastu kiñcina manaḥprahlādi sālaṅkṛti locanam pratipattṛbhiriti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1121: svayaṃ darpaḥ paraiśca stūyamānatetyarthaḥ. vāgvikalpāḥ vākpravṛttihetupratibhāvyāpāraprakārā iti vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1126: yataśca śobāhetutve 'pi nādarāspadaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ. na ceyamabhāvasambhāvanā nirmūlaiva dūṣitetyāha--tathā cānyeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:1150: samarthanāya 'na cāsmābhirabhāvavādināṃ vikalpāḥ śrutāḥ' iti prāguktaṃ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1151: yathāśrutārthakasyāsya ślokasya śrutatve 'pi pūrvopadarśitānāṃ bahūnāmabhāvavādaprakārāṇāṃ viśiṣyāśrutatvena tadvacanasya tatparatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1152: granthakṛdityādinā matsaraṃ tadukterhetutvena vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairvakroktiśūnyaṃ ca yat /
GK16andhvc1u:1153: kāvyaṃ taddhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsañjaḍo no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1158: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairiti śabdālaṅkārāṇām /
GK16andhvc1u:1166: jaḍena pṛṣṭo bhrūbhaṅgakaṭākṣādibhirevottaraṃ dadattatsvarūpaṃ kāmamācakṣīteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1183: tat tathāvidhamarthālaṅkārādiśūnyaṃ 'kāvyaṃ dhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsan jaḍaḥ dhvalanessvarūpaṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭassan kimabhidadhāti
GK16andhvc1u:1190: abhāva ukta ityasya śabdālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthaguṇānāmityanayorapi sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1201: yadvā-gate anyagamane gatamanugamanaṃ gatānugataṃ tadeṣāmastīti gatānukatikāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1205: kimityete vikalpāḥ prarasparasambaddhā vyākhyātā iti śaṅkāyāṃ vṛttigranthānuguṇyādityāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1212: bhajyate sevyate tadārthena prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti bhaktirdharmo 'bhidheyena sāmīpyādiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1234: gaṅgādipadalakṣyatīrādyarthenetyarthaḥ. nanvatra padārthakartṛkaṃ sevanannāma kimityata āha-utprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1240: tena ca vaktuḥ pratipatturvā tīrādergaṅgadipadena pratipādane sāmīpyādernimittatvena paryālocanarūpaṃ yadutprekṣaṇantadatra vivakṣitamityāha-prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1251: tāṃ prayojanatvenoddiśya tata bālapriyā gauṇārthasyāpyuktarītyaiva lābhe 'pi tallābhaḥ prakārāntareṇāpi vaktavya ityāśayenāhaguṇeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1256: siṃhādiśabdā hi siṃhatvādijātiṃ tadviśiṣṭavyakti vā abhidadhānā api svārthāvinābhūtān śauryādiguṇānapyākṣepātpratipādayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1260: kecittu-guṇasamudāyavṛtterityāsya guṇādvārā samudāye guṇini māmavakādau vṛttiryasya tasyetyarthamāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1267: nanu gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādistale lakṣyatīrādau gaṅgāgatapāvanatvādikameva pratipādyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:1269: evaṃ siṃho māṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādau siṃhāditādrūpyaṃ parākramātiśayādikaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1272: tathā ca sāmīpyataikṣaṇyādāvityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti cet;
GK16andhvc1u:1274: pare tu-sāmīpyādeḥ paramparayā prayojanasādhanatvatsāmīpyapadena pāvanatvādikaṃ taikṣṇyapadena siṃhatādrūpyādikañca lakṣaṇayāvivakṣitamato nāsaṅgatirityāhuḥ
GK16andhvc1u:1292: locanam āgato bhākta iti gauṇo lākṣaṇikaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:1316: nanu dhvanirnāma guṇavṛttivyātirekī nāstīti vaktavye sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasya ko 'bhiprāya ityata āha-sāmānādhikaraṇyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1317: 'taṃ bhāktam' iti mūle 'dhvanisaṃjñitam' ityādinā vṛttau ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1322: na tu dhvanerasarvathopacārasparśitvamapītyamumarthandyotayituṃ siddhāntaviruddhatādātmyapakṣopakṣepārtho 'yaṃ sāmānādikaraṇyena nirdeśa iti bhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1335: mūlakāra iti śeṣaḥ. vṛttau 'gumavṛttiri'ti bhāktaśabdasya vyākhyānaṃ tatpadena prakṛte vivakṣitānarthānvivṛṇoti--guṇā ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:1337: yadyapi ca dhvaniśabdasaṃkīrtanena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyibhirguṇavṛttiranyo vā na kaścitprakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1338: tathāpi amukhyavṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyāvahāraṃ locanam guṇāḥ sāmīpyādayo dharmāstaikṣṇyādayaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:1340: tairupāyervṛttirvā śabdasya yatra sa guṇavṛtti- śabdo 'rtho vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1382: vṛttau 'anyo ve'tyātra guṇavṛtternyo mukhya ityarthabhramaḥ syādato vyācaṣṭa-guṇoti /
GK16andhvc1u:1386: darśayatā dhvanimārgau manākspṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti pariklpyaivamuktam-'bhāktamāhustamanye' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1390: bhāmahenoktaṃ--'śabdāśchandobhidānārthāḥ' iti abhidhānasya śabdādbhedaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhaṭṭodbhaṭo babhāṣe--'śabdānābhidhānamabhidhāvyāpāro mukhyo guṇavṛtiśca' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1394: yathāliśitapāṭhakaistu bālapriyā darśayate'ti manāk sparśe hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1396: anena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyina eva vivakṣitā ityāśayena pūrayati-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1398: lokoyuktiḥ kalāśceti mantavyāḥ kāvyahetavaḥ” iti śiṣṭaṃ pādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:1405: tathā cā'bhidhānam' iti vacanena bhāmaho 'guṇavṛtti'riti vacanena bhaṭṭoṭbhaṭo 'lakṣaṇe'ti vacanena vāmanaśca kāvyeṣu guṇavṛtyā vyavahāraṃ darśitavanta iti phalitārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1406: 'dhvanimārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣitaḥ 'ityamuṃ bhāgaṃ pūrvaṃpakṣopakṣepānuguṇyena vyācaṣṭe-taistāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1410: guṇavṛtyā vyacavahāraṃ darśayadbhireva bhāmahabhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ dhvanergamakaṃ pradarśitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1411: tairdhvanimārgasya sparśe 'pi lakṣaṇakaraṇena pṛthak tatsvarūpasyānirūpaṇādguṇavṛttireva dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1412: na tadatirikta iti taduktimarthasiddhāmupajīvyedaṃ bhāktavādaprasthānaṃ pravṛttamityāha- yathālikhitetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1413: tu śabdaḥ parantvityarthe . na lakṣita ityāsya vyākhyānam--tatsvarūpaviveko na kṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1415: tenevaṃvidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye locanam svarūpavivekaṃ kartumaśaknuvadbhistatsvarūpaviveko na kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1419: yadyevaṃ na yojyate tadā dhvanimārgaḥ spṛṣṭa iti pūrvapakṣābhidhānaṃ virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1440: yathāśrutaṃ vicāraṃ vinā yattadgranthānāṃ lakṣyabhūtānāṃ dhniyuktakāvyagranthānāmudgrahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tanmātreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1448: tato hetorbhaktireva dhvanirna tadatirikta iti tadabhiprāyamuktiparyantaṃ kalpayitvā 'bhāktamāhustamanye' ityuktamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:1450: dhvanermārgaḥ-mṛgyate 'nviṣyate vicāryate iti mārgaḥ avivakṣitavācyalakṣaṇo bhedaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ jñāta iti kuto na vyākhyāta ityata āha--yadyevamityādi
GK16andhvc1u:1452: dhvanyavāntarabhedasya jñāne sati guṇavṛttireva dhvanirna tadatirikta iti vacanamasaṅgataṃ bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1453: yadvā-nanu 'na lakṣita' iti grantho na dṛṣṭa iti yathāśrutārthaparatayā kuto na vyākhyāta ityata āha--yadyevamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1456: dhvaneḥ spṛṣṭatvasyāddaṣṭatvasya ca vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1464: locanam prācyā hi viparyastā eva sarvathā /
GK16andhvc1u:1466: antyāstvanapahnuvānā api lakṣayituṃ na jānata iti krameṇa viṣaryāsasandehājñānāprādhānyameteṣām /
GK16andhvc1u:1468: ekaiko 'pyayaṃ vipratipattirūpo vākyārtho nirūpaṇe hetutvaṃ pratipadyata ityekavacanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1470: āsu madhye eko 'pi yo vimatiprakārastenaiva hetunātatsvarūpaṃbrūma iti,
GK16andhvc1u:1472: abhidānābhidheyalakṣaṇo bālapriyā viparyastāḥ dehātmavādicārvākā iva viparyayajñānayuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1494: ekavacanena tu teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ hetutvamastīti bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1501: 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagaduḥ' 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūmaḥ 'bhāktamāhuḥ' tasyahi dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:1507: atha śrotṛgataprayojanaprayojanapratipādakaṃ 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti bhāgaṃ vyākhyātumāha-tasya hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:1509: dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ lakṣayatāṃ sambandhini bālapriyā 'tena brūmaḥ' 'kecidūcuḥ' tena brūmaḥ' iti pṛthak pṛtak yojanā labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1510: avatārikoktarītyā 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityanena pradarśitamabhidheyādikaṃ śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgaṃ prasaṅgāddarśayati-dhvanisvarūpamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1521: vipratipattyupanyāsapūrvakaṃ 'tena brūma' ityuktyā vimatinivṛtteḥ prayojanatvaṃ labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1530: śrotṛgataṃ prayojanaṃ pūrvektaṃ vimatinivṛttyā saha dhvanisvarūpajñānaṃ. tasya yatprayojanaṃ prītirūpaṃ tatpratipādakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1538: labhatāmiti prayojanaṃ sampādayituṃ tatsvarūpaṃ prakāśyata iti bālapriyā tenātra vivakṣitamāha--nirvṛttyātmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1539: nanu hetvantaraprāpitāpratiṣṭatva eva 'pratiṣṭāṃ labhatām' ityukteḥ prasaktirityata āha-parairityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1547: kārikāyāṃ 'prītaye' ityatraprītiṃ sampādayitumityarthe 'kriyārthe' tyādisūtreṇa caturthīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1552: atra 'tena tattvarūpaṃ brūma' ityuktyā vimitinivṛttestatsvarūpavacanaprayojanatvaṃ yadyapi labhyate,
GK16andhvc1u:1556: prayojanaṃ ca nāma tatsampādakavastuprayoktṛtāpārāṇatayaiva tathā bhavatītyāśayena 'prītaye tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityekavākyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1558: sakalaśabdena satkaviśabdena ca prakāralese kasmiṃściditi nirākaroti /
GK16andhvc1u:1560: na hi 'siṃho baṭuḥ' 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ' ityatra ramyatā kācit /
GK16andhvc1u:1563: atha cetyādinā 'tatsamayāntaḥpātina' bālapriyā ityamumartha prayojanapadārthanirvacanapūrvakaṃ pradarśayati-prayojanañcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1568: sā prāṇo yasya tadbhāvenaiva tatprerakatvasvabhāvaśālitayaiveti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1577: kintu prītereveti saiva tasya mukhyaṃ prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1583: atastathā tanmūlaṃ vṛttikṛtā vyākhyātamiti vimatinivṛtterapi mukhyaprayojanatvasambhave
GK16andhvc1u:1584: 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūmaḥ' 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye tatatsvarūpaṃ mūḥ' iti ca vyākhyeyatayā
GK16andhvc1u:1594: yataḥ sakalaśabdena nikhilaviṣayavyāptatvaṃ satkaviśabdena pramāṇasiddhatvātprādhānyaṃ coktaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:1606: atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārataprabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddhavyavahāraṃ lakṣayatāṃ sahṛdayānāmānando manasi labhatāṃ pratiṣṭhāmiti prakāśyate
GK16andhvc1u:1608: rāmāyaṇamahābhārataśabdenādikaveḥ prabhṛti sarvaireva sūribhirasyādaraḥ kṛta iti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1614: yeṣāṃ kāvyānuśīlanābhyāsavaśādviśadībhūte manomukure varṇanīyatanmayībhavanayogyatā te svahṛdayasaṃvādabhājaḥ bālapriyā anenādyābhāvavādo nirākṛtaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:1616: 'tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityasya lakṣaṇapradarśanena dhvanisvarūpaṃ prakāśayāma iti svalvarthaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1629: manasau mukurarūpaṇena svato vaiśadye 'pi saṃskāravaśādatirekaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1640: asman pakṣe samānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmiti bahuvrīhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1642: yathoktam-- yo 'rtho hṛdayasaṃvādī tasya bhāvo rasodbhavaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1646: rasacarvaṇātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ darsayan rasadhvanereva sarvatra mukhyabhūtamātmatvamiti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1647: tena yaduktam--- dhanirnāmāparo yo 'pi vyāpāro vyañjanātmakaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1648: tasya siddhe 'pi bhede syātkarvye 'śatevaṃ na rūpatā //
GK16andhvc1u:1650: tathā hyabhidhābhāvanārasacarvaṇātmake 'pi tryaṃśe kāvye rasacarvaṇā tāvajjīvitabhūteti bhavato 'pyavivādo 'sti /
GK16andhvc1u:1651: yathoktaṃ tvayaiva-- kāvye rasayitā sarvo na boddhā na niyogabhākt /
GK16andhvc1u:1667: rasacarvaṇaivātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa ānandaḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc1u:1670: vastvalaṅkāraraseṣu rasadhvanereva prādhānyamitarayostu tatparyavasāyitayā gaiṃṇamiti darśayitumetaduktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1683: vastuto nirūpyamāṇe bhedo na sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1685: tasya kāvye aṃśatvaṃ syāt rūpatā ātmatvarūpamaṃśitvam /
GK16andhvc1u:1698: na boddhā itihāsādāviva boddhā sarvo na,
GK16andhvc1u:1699: tathā na niyogabhāk vedādāviva niyojyaḥ locanam tadvastvalaṅkāradhvanyabhiprāyeṇāṃśamātratvamiti siddhasādhanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1709: ko 'sya kāvyarūpasya vyutpattihetorjāyāsaṃmititvalakṣaṇo bālapriyā sarvaḥ na adhikārīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1711: anena rasacarvaṇāyā adhikārasampādakatvavacanena tasyāḥ prādhānyema jīvitatvamuktameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1715: na niyogabhāk prabhuriva na niyogakartetyartha iti vyācakṣate /
GK16andhvc1u:1725: nanu kīrtyādiphalāntarāṇāmapi sattvāt 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' ityasyopalakṣaṇatvamabhyupetya tānyapi kuto noktānītyatrāha--tetretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1726: tatra iti prādhānyenānanda evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1738: asya kāvyarūpasya vedādibhyaḥ itihāsādibhyaśca ko viśeṣaḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:1742: caturvargavyutpatterapi cānanda eva pāryantikaṃ mukhyaṃ phalam /
GK16andhvc1u:1744: tena sa ānandavardhanācārya etacchāstradvārema sahṛdayahṛdayeṣu pratiṣṭāṃ devatāyatanādivadanaśvarīṃ sthitiṃ gacchatviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1746: āsta eva nirātaṅkaṃ kāntaṃ kāvyamayaṃ vapuḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1751: svanāmaprakajīkaraṇaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ pravṛttyaṅgameva bālapriyā vadādiprabhṛtīnāṃ prabhvadisammitatvaṃ kāvyapradīpādau vivṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:1756: caturvargavyutpatterapi ca pāryantikaṃ phalamānanda eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1768: pratiṣṭāśabdo hi devatānāṃ tatsamucitāyatane sthitau prasiddha ityato devatetyādiddaṣṭāntakathanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1772: śāstradvāreṇa vartanaṃ nāma śāstrasyaiva vartanamityabhiprāyeṇa bhāmahavacanaṃ saṃvādayati-yathoktamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:1781: anena granthakṛto 'pi kīrtidvārā prītirūpaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti darśatam /
GK16andhvc1u:1788: evaṃ granthakṛtaḥ kaveḥ śrotuśca mukhyaṃ prayojanamuktam // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:1789: nanu 'dhvanisvarūpaṃ brūma' iti pratijñāya vācyapratīyamānākhyau dvau bhedāvarthasyeti vācyābhidhāne kā saṅgatiḥ kārakāyā ityāśaṅkya saṅgatiṃ kartumavataraṇikāṃ karoti--tatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:1793: tathā dhvanisvarūpe pratīyamānākhye nirūpayitavye nirvivādasiddhavācyābhidhānaṃ bhūmiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1795: vācyena bālapriyā kimarthamevaṃ svanāmaprakaṭīkaraṇatvena vyākhyānamityata āha--sveti /
GK16andhvc1u:1803: granthānte vakṣyāmaḥ “ānandavardhana iti prathitābhidhāna” ityasya vyākhyāvasare prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1823: apūrvaṃ yannirmīyata iti apūrvanirmāṇaṃ prāsādādi tasmin /
GK16andhvc1u:1834: vācya-pratīyamānākhyau tasya bhedāv ubhau smṛtau // DhvK_1.2 //
GK16andhvc1u:1846: tatpṛṣṭe pakṣabhūte tasminnutthitatayā vyatiriktatayā pratīyamānāṃśasya ulliṅganādanumānāditi kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:1871: tat kāvyamanuprāṇayati jīvayati sahṛdayāhlādakaṃ karotīti tadanuprāṇavaṃ, tena /
GK16andhvc1u:1877: yadvā-śabdārthayormadhye śarīrabhāga evetyevakāreṇa ātmakojiniveśe yogyatā nirasyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1879: sarvajanasaṃvedyā dharmāḥ tīvratvamandatvādayo madhuratvaparuṣatvādayo vā yasya tattvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1880: ddaṣṭānte tu sthūlatvādayo dharmāḥ tīvratvamandatvādayo madhuratvaparuṣatvādayo vā yasya tattvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1894: sa eka evārtho dviśākhatayā vivekibhirvibhāgabuddhyā vibhajyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1897: yo viśeṣaḥ, sa pratīyamānabhāgo vivekibhirviśeṣahetutvādātmeti vyavasthāpyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1902: arthamātreṇa vyutpannajanavedyena kṛtsnenārthena vyavahāraṃ prati vyavahartavyasya hetutvābhiprāyeṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:1944: kāvyārthaṃ sampādayatīti tasya viśeṣahetutvarūpātmaguṇayogādātmatvaṃ kāvyasya hi
GK16andhvc1u:1948: ata eva artha ityekatayopakrasya sahṛdayaślādhya iti viśeṣaṇadvārā hetumabhidhāyāpoddhāraddaśā tasya dvau bhedāvaṃśāvityuktam,
GK16andhvc1u:1952: acitaśabdena rasaviṣayamevaucityaṃ bhavatīti darśayan rasadhvanerjīvitatvaṃ sūcayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1953: tadabhāve hi kimapekṣayedamaucityaṃ nāma sarvatrauddhoṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1958: tayā nirūḍhanibiḍataratādrūpyabhāvanāvāsanādhirūḍhayā vimohitaṃ vivekasāmarthyarahitaṃ kṛtaṃ hṛdayaṃ yoṣā- taiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1963: ata eva yato dehātmanyāyena vācyavyaṅgyayoravasthānaṃ vivecakāvivecakaddaṣṭidvayānurodhinī catatpṛthagbhāvāpṛthagbhāvaparicchittistata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:1985: 'arthassahṛdayaślādhyaḥ kāvyātmā yo vyavasthita' iti ca kārikāpāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1994: sthitaḥ sahṛdayaślādhyo yo 'rthastasya vācyaḥ pratīyamānaśceti dvau bhedau /
GK16andhvc1u:1995: locanam yo 'rtha iti yadānuvadan pareṇāpyetattāvadabhyupagatamiti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1996: tasyetyādinā tadabhyupagama eva dvyaṃśatve satyupapadyata iti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:2000: athāpyevaṃ syāttathāpi vācye 'naikāntiko bālapriyā rasaviṣayamaucityaṃ rasasya prādhānyaṃ vinā na ghaṭate,
GK16andhvc1u:2030: nanu dhvanerātmatve 'pi cārutvahetutvaṃ kiṃ na syādatyato dṛṣṭāntagarbhaṃmāha-na hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2044: pratīyamānasaṃvalanopādhikasya cārutvahetutvasya vācyārte 'pi sattvāttasya guṇālaṅkāravyatiriktatvacca tatra vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2045: tatra vācyaḥ prasiddho yaḥ prakārair upamādibhiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2062: 'tato neha pratanyata' iti viśeṣapratiṣedhena śeṣābhyanujñeti darśayati--kevalamityādinā // .3 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:2075: apiśabdenaikasyaiva bahudhā vyākaraṇe virodhaṃ darśayatānyeṣāmapāraṃ maurkhyaṃ dyotyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2081: tasya viśeṣarūpasya pratiṣedhena tatpratidvandvitayā pariśiṣṭamanuvadanaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ // 3 //
GK16andhvc1u:2082: pratīyamānaṃ punar anyad eva vastv asti vāṇīṣu mahā-kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:2095: bālapriyā 'pratīyamānam' ityādikārikāvyākhyānenaiva 'sahyartha' ityataḥ prāktano vṛttigrantho 'pi vyākhyāto bhavatītyāśayena kārikāṃ vyācaṣṭe--punaśśabda ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2112: evaṃvidhaṃ vyatiriktaṃ sārabhūtaṃ ca pratīyamānam asti /
GK16andhvc1u:2122: kintu āpaṇādau sadeva rajatādi śuktikādau bhātīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2133: iti vyāptiḥ kārikāyāṃ vṛtto ca pradarśitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2138: yat tat prasiddhāvayavātiriktaṃ vibhāti lāvaṇyam ivāṅganāsu // DhvK_1.4b //
GK16andhvc1u:2141: yattatsahṛdayasuprasiddhaṃ prasiddhebhyo 'laṅkṛtebhyaḥ pratītebhyo vāvayavebhyo vyatiriktatvena prakāśate lāvaṇyabhivāṅganāsu /
GK16andhvc1u:2142: yathā hyaṅganāsu lāvaṇye pṛthaṅnirvarṇyamānaṃ nikhilāvayavavyatireki kimapyanyadeva sahṛdayalocanāmṛtaṃ tattvāntaraṃ tadvadeva so 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2150: 'siddhaṃ dharmiṇamuddiśya sādhyadharme 'bhidhīyata' iti vacanānurodhena prasiddhaṃ dharmīti coktaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:2154: vācyasyaiva pratīyamānatvamabhyupagacchatāṃ mate svātmakapratīyamānavatvaṃ siddhamiti siddhasādhanavāraṇāya svavyatiriktatvaniveśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2158: atra svavyatiriktapratīyamānapadārthatvena lāvaṇyaṃ grāhyamiti pradarśayituṃ lāvaṇyopetetyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:2160: vṛttau 'alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ pratītebhyo vā' ityatra vāśabdaḥ samuccayārthaka iti pradarśayituṃ vyācaṣṭe--prasiddhaśabdasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2163: 'tadi' ti tacchabdastu prasiddhārthaka ityāśayena 'sahṛdayasuprasiddham' iti vṛttau vyākhyātam,
GK16andhvc1u:2168: camatkārasāraṃ pratīyamānaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ ca tasya bhāvastattā tasyāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2178: sarvoṣu ca teṣu prakāreṣu tasya vācyādanyatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:2179: locanam na cāvayavānāmeva nirdeṣatā vā bhūṣaṇayego vā lāvaṇyam,
GK16andhvc1u:2185: tathā bhāsamānatvamasiddho heturityāśaṅkya sa hyartha ityādinā svarūpaṃ tasyābhidhatte /
GK16andhvc1u:2194: vṛttau 'kimapī'tyādeḥ dārṣṭāntike 'pi sambandho bodhya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2209: 'kimityeva na jānīma' ityevakārasūcitaṃ kaimutikanyāyaṃ spaṣṭīkaroti-dūra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2222: kāvyaṃ śabdārthamayaṃ tasya śabdasyārthasya ca yo vyāpāraḥ vyañjanārūpaḥ tadaikagocaraḥ nānyagocaraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2233: anyatra vācyārthe yo locanam evānyatra guṇībhāvābhāvāt,
GK16andhvc1u:2237: yastu svapne 'pi na svaśbdavācyo na laukikavyavahārapatitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2240: nanvanalaṅkārasvarūpatve kathamalaṅkāra dhvaniriti vyavahāra ityata ahā--pūrveti /
GK16andhvc1u:2253: samarpyamāṇāḥ samyaktayā rasābhivyañjanasamucitatayā arpyamāṇāḥ sahṛdayahṛdayamukurodare saṃkrāmitāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2259: śabdasamarpyamāṇāḥ hṛdayasaṃvādasundarāśca ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ teṣāṃ samucitāḥ prākjanmanaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2260: ārabhya “na hyetaccittavṛttiśūnyaḥ prāṇī bhavatī“tyuktadiśā ātmani viśeṣato niviṣṭāḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2263: sukumārā rasacarvaṇayogyatāṃ gatā yā svasya carvayituḥ sahṛdayasya saṃvit samyagvettyanayeti saṃvinmanaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2264: tasyā ya ānandamayaḥ carvaṇārūpo vyāpāraḥ tena,
GK16andhvc1u:2273: yathā-- bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:2282: vastvalaṅkāradhvanyo rasadhvaniparyantatvameveti vayameva vakṣyāmastatra tatretyāstāṃ tāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:2283: vācyasāmarthyākṣiptamiti bhedatrayavyāpakaṃ bālapriyā vastvādidhvanito viśeṣamāha---sa ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:2305: vācyayorvastvalaṅkārayoriva dhvanyamānayorapi tayoḥ vibhāvādirūpatvena kasyacidrasasya vyañjakatayā paryavasānādrasadhvaniviśrāntatvamevetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2310: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣiptam' iti klībaikavacanāntatvena nirdeśādvastumātramityasyaiva viśeṣaṇamiti bhramaḥ sthādatastannivṛttaye vyācaṣṭe---vāyyasāmarthyakṣiptamiti
GK16andhvc1u:2319: etadarthaṃ prathamaṃ tāvevodāharati--- 'bhrama dhārmika visrabdhaḥ sa śunako 'dya māritastena /
GK16andhvc1u:2321: bālapriy.ā rasādaya ityanayorapi yojanā kārtheti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2322: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣipta' iti paṭhi tu artha ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:2327: nanu śabdaśaktimūle dhvanau śabdaśaktireva sahakāriṇī netaretya āha--śabdetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2349: anyata uddhṛtya tatpratipādakavākyāni āharati prabandhamimaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2354: kacchādipadayoḥ kūlalatāgahaneti ca vivaraṇam locanam kasyāścitsaṅketasthānaṃ jīvitasarvasvāyamānaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:2363: sañcaraṇena yo 'ntarāyaḥ cauryasuratasya khalpakālavicchedarūpo vighnaḥ tadrūpo dāṣastasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2370: atra bhramamarūpe vākyārthe 'vidhirniṣedhābhāvarūpaḥ na tu praiṣādirūpo niyoga' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2371: nanu kimiti mukhya eva na syādityatrāha--pratiprasavātmaka iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2376: yathoktaṃ 'prāpte tu pratiṣedhe hi pratiprasavayogitā' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2382: ato bhramaṇasyedānīṃ na kaścit pratibandha iti niṣedhābhāvo 'tra vidheḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2384: na khalveṣā svairiṇī rājeva bhramaṇavidhiṃ karoti,
GK16andhvc1u:2390: atha bhramaṇaniṣedhasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan vācyatvādikaṃ nirākaroti--tetretyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:2402: tanna bālapriyā na vācyatā na abhidheyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:2411: ekaśśabda ekamarthamabhidhayā bodhayitvā punastayā arthāntaraṃ na bodhayati yataḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2418: śaktiḥ bodhajananasāmarthyaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā satī /
GK16andhvc1u:2422: yadyevaṃ tarhi niṣedhasyaivātra bodho bhavatviti śaṅkate---nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2433: 'vācyārthasya ca vākyārthe sambandhānupapattitaḥ' ityuktaṃ mukhyārthabādhaṃ darśayati--dṛptetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2434: bhrametyasya mukhyārthakatve dṛptatvādyabhidhānasya vaiyarthyāpattyā dṛptādipadārthaghaṭitavākyārthe bhramaṇavidhirūpamukhyārthasya yo 'nanvayaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2446: naitat; trayo hyatra vyāpārāḥ saṃvedyante--padārtheṣu sāmānyātmasvabhidhāvyāpāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2455: na tu vyañjitamiti vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2481: tathā ca sarvasmin viśeṣe samayaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2491: agṛhītasaṅketakasyāpi gavādivyaktiviśeṣasya gavādivyaktiviśeṣasya gavādipadena bodhodayāttatra saṅketagrahasya vyabhicārāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2492: atha dvitīyaṃ vyāpāraṃ saviṣayaṃ darśayati--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2497: tātparyaśāktiḥ sa vākyārthaḥ paraḥpradhānatayā pratipādyaḥ yeṣāṃ tāni tatparāṇi teṣāṃ bhāvastātparya tadrūpā śaktiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2500: sāmānyāni padairabhihitāḥ sāmānyarūpā arthāḥ anyathā viśeṣāṇāmanavagamane /
GK16andhvc1u:2504: 'sāmānyānanyathe'ti pāṭhe tu locanam tatra ca dvitīyakakṣyāyāṃ 'bhrame'ti vidhyatiriktaṃ na kiñcitpratīyate,
GK16andhvc1u:2506: na hi 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ' 'siṃho baṭuḥ' ityatra yathānvaya eva bubhūṣan pratihanyate,
GK16andhvc1u:2508: tathā tava bhramamaniṣeddhā sa śvā siṃhena hataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2510: ata eva mukhyārthabādhā nātra śaṅkyeti na viparītalakṣaṇāyā avasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2516: parasparaṃ virodha iti cet--so 'yaṃ tarhyanvaye virodhaḥ pratyeyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2541: atha lakṣaṇāprayojanaviṣaye dhvanivyāpāraṃ pradarśayiṣyannabhyupagamyāpi lakṣaṇāntasyāḥ pūrvapakṣyabhimatatātparyaśaktiviṣayakakṣyāniveśaṃ nirākurvannāha--bhavatu vetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2556: uktī virodhaḥ padārthānāṃ svātmanyuta parasparamiti vikalpaṃ hṛdi nidhāyādyaṃ nirācaṣṭe-na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2566: nanvevaṃ 'aṅgulyagre karivaraśatam' kintu pramāṇāntareṇa so 'nvayaḥ pratyakṣādinā bādhitaḥ pratipanne 'pi śuktikāyāṃ rajatamiveti tadavagamakāriṇo vākyasyāprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2567: 'siṃhomāṇavakaḥ' ityatra dvitīyakakṣyāniviṣṭatātparyaśaktisamarpitānvayabādhakollāsānantaramabhidhātātparyaśaktidvayavyatirikta bālapriyā tarhi saḥ lakṣaṇamūlatvena prasiddhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2573: dharmiṇyapratīte dharmarūpasya virodhasya tatra pratītyayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2577: mukhyārthabādhā nāma lakṣaṇāsthale 'siho māṇavaka' ityādau siṃhādipadamukhyārthasya
GK16andhvc1u:2580: viruddhatvaṃ ca tasminnanvaye siṃhādipratiyogikatvasya māṇavakādyanuyogikatvasya ca dvayorabhāvena tadrūpaṃ bādhitatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:2582: bhavati ca satyapi bādhaniścaye vākyajanyo bodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2593: 'pratipanno 'pi so 'nvayaḥ śuktikāyāṃ rajatamiṃva pratyakṣādinā pramāṇāntareṇa bādhita' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2597: nanu tarhi 'siṃho māṇavaka' ityāderapyaprāmāṇyaṃ syādityatrāha--siṃha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2601: tadvādhakasya anvayabādhakasya vidhurīkaraṇe locanam tāvattṛtīyaiva śaktistadbādhakavidhurīkaraṇanipuṇā lakṣaṇābhidhānā samullasati /
GK16andhvc1u:2607: na yasya kasyaciditi cet-guṇālaṅkāraucityasundaraśabdārthaśarīrasya sati dhvananākhyātmani kāvyarūpatāvyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2612: tathā hi-tritayasannidhau lakṣaṇā pravartata iti tāvadbhavanta eva vadanti /
GK16andhvc1u:2614: nimittaṃ ca yadabidhīyate sāmīpyādi tadapi pramāṇāntarāvagamyameva /
GK16andhvc1u:2617: tathā ca tatra lakṣyārthasya na bādhitatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2625: guṇālaṅkārāṇāmaucityena rasaviṣayakeṇa sundarau śabdārthāveva śarīlaṃ tasya /
GK16andhvc1u:2629: tatā dhvananākhyātmano laukikavākye sattve 'pi nāsāratā kāpītyartha /
GK16andhvc1u:2650: atha yatra yatraivaṃśabdaprayogastatra tatra taddharmayoga ityanumānam,
GK16andhvc1u:2651: tasyāpi vyāptigrahaṇakāle maulikaṃ pramāmāntaraṃ vācyam, na cāsti /
GK16andhvc1u:2654: bālapriyā 'yattu atipavitratvādikaṃ parākramātiśayaśālitvaṃ vā tatre'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2656: idaṃ cātipavitratvādeḥ tīre pratyāyānadvārā ghoṣa'pi tatpratyāyanamasti tasyaiva paramatātparyaviṣayatvādityāśayenoktam /
GK16andhvc1u:2663: nanu tarhi śabdenāpi na tatpratītirityalaṃ tahyāpārāntaragaveṣaṇayetyata āha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2665: śabdasya na tāvanna vyāpāra ityuktaṃ draḍhayati--tathāṃ hītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:2692: sāmānyamukhavyāptyadhīnānamitisthale prakṛtasādhyahetvoḥ tatsajātīyayorvā pratyakṣādinā vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2695: iyaṃ pāvanatvādiprayojanajñānaṃ locanam niyamāpratipattervakturetadvivakṣitamityadhyavasāyābhāvaprasaṅgāccatyasti tāvadatra śabdasyaiva vyāpāraḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2702: tatrāpi hi skhaladgatitve punarmukyārthabādā nimittaṃ prayojanamityanavasthā syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2703: ata eva yatkenacillakṣitalakṣaṇeti nāma kṛtaṃ tahyasanamātram /
GK16andhvc1u:2712: yata evaṃ nānyagamyaṃ prayojanaṃ tata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2722: tasmādyat skhaladgatitvaṃ skalantī pratihanyamānā gatiravabodhanavyāpāro yasya śabdasya tasya bhāvastattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:2733: prayojanaṃ nimittīkṛtyāpi lakṣyārthāt skhaladgatitve 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe punaḥ punarapi lakṣaṇāmūlaparikalpanayālakṣaṇānavasthā syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2736: gaṅgādiśabdena tīrādau lakṣite punaḥ pāvanatvādiprayojanamapi lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:2737: ata eva tallakṣaṇāyāḥ lakṣitalakṣaṇeti nāmeti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:2743: vakṣyate ca “tenāyaṃ lakṣatalakṣaṇāyā na viṣayaḥ” iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2748: yaduddisya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:2754: bālapriyā sodarāḥ paryāyāśca ye vyapadeśāḥ śabdāḥ taiḥ nirūpito niścita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2756: vyapadeśaśca vyapadeśyaṃ vinā na tiṣṭatīti tacchravaṇānyathānupapattinirūpaṇīyo 'yamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:2759: evaṃ prayojanaviṣayakaṃ dhvananavyāpāraṃ prasādhya tamevetaravyāpāratrayādbhedena spaṣṭayituṃ vyāpārāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ darśayati--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2765: anyathā ātmānaṃ vinā anupapattirasambhavaḥ prayojanābhāvādinā sahāyo yasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc1u:2766: kecittu tasya viśeṣarūpasyānvitārthasya anyathā tātparyābhāve yā anupapattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2777: locanam sa ca prāgvṛttaṃ vyāpāratrayaṃ nyakkurvanpradhānabhūtaḥ kāvyātmetyāśayena
GK16andhvc1u:2799: tathāca kathaṃ vṛttikṛtā 'pratiṣedharūpa' iti vadatā vyañjanāvyāpārasya niṣedhaviṣayakatvamuktamityata āha-ityāśayenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2800: ityāśayena uktabhiprāyeṇa 'prayojanaviṣayo 'pi saḥ niṣedhapramukhatayā niṣedhaviṣaya ityuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2808: vastuto 'tra lakṣaṇā na pravartata iti vṛttigranthānuguṇyenāha--abhyupagametyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2813: yatra vācyasyātyantatiraskāro 'nyasaṅkramaṇaṃ vā tatra hi lakṣaṇā /
GK16andhvc1u:2816: tatrāpi kiṃ na lakṣaṇetyata āha--na hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2828: ayaṃ vaktā edvibakṣuḥ etacchabdaprayogāt ityādiḥ prayogo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2833: yopyanvitābhidhānavādī 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hṛdaye grahūtvā śaravadabhidhāvyāpārameva dīrghadīrghamicchati,
GK16andhvc1u:2838: sajātīye ca kārye viramyavyāpāraḥ śabdakarmabuddhyādīnāṃ padārthavidbhirniṣiddhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2842: atha ca jñāyamānaḥ saṃjñāśabdaḥ saṃjñini cakṣussannikarṣādikāle svaviśeṣaṇakaṃ saṃjñipratyakṣaṃ janayati iti mataviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2853: yo 'rthaḥ paraḥ pradhānapratipādyaḥ tātparyaviṣayo yasya saḥ śabdārthaḥ śabdābhidheyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2857: yathā dhanurdhareṇa preritaśśaro vegākhyenaikeneva vyāpārema parasya varmacchedanagātrabhedanādikā anekakriyāḥ karoti,
GK16andhvc1u:2858: tathā sukavinā prayuktaḥ śabdo 'bhidhākhyenaikenaiva vyāpāreṇa padārthavākyārthayolaṅkṣyatvena vyaṅgyatvenābhimatayośca pratītīrjanayatītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2859: itthaṃ tanmatamupanyasya tenāpi dhvananamaṅgīkārayituṃ sa dīrgho 'bhidhāvyāpāraḥ kimekaḥ prativiṣayamaneko veti vikalpyādyaṃ pratyācaṣṭe-tasyetyādi
GK16andhvc1u:2874: sa eva jhaṭiti vākyenābhidhīyata ityevaṃvidhaṃ dīrghadīrghatvaṃ vivakṣitam,
GK16andhvc1u:2879: tasya paścāttanāḥ padārthāvagamāḥ bālapriyā sahakāriṇaḥ samayamukyārthabādhādivaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2893: yadvāsajātīya ityāderayamarthaḥ--kiñca vyāpārasya yatkāryamanekārthajñānaṃ tatatatsajātīyamanyadveti vikalpaṃ manasi nidhāyāha--sajātīya ityādi
GK16andhvc1u:2902: atha vyāpārasya dīrghatvaṃ nāma naikatvamekajātīyatvaṃ vā;
GK16andhvc1u:2926: locanam nimittabhāvaṃ gacchantīti nūnaṃ mīmāṃsakasya prapautraṃ prati naimittikatvamabhimatam /
GK16andhvc1u:2927: athocyate--pūrvaṃ tatra saṅketagrahaṇasaṃskṛtasya tathā pratipattirbhavatītyamuyā vastusthitayā nimittatvaṃ padārtānām,
GK16andhvc1u:2931: āvāpodvāpābhyaṃ tathābhāva iti cet-saṅketaḥ padārthamātra evetyabhyupagame pāscātyaiva viśeṣapratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2932: athocyate--ddaṣṭeva jhaṭiti tātparyapratipattiḥ kimatra kurma iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2937: kiṃ tu sātisayānuśīlanābhyāsāttatra sambhāvyamānī'pi kramaḥ sajātīyatadvikalpaparamparānudayādabhyastaviṣayavyāptisamayasmṛtikramavanna saṃvedyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2941: atha padārtapratīteḥ paścāttanatve 'pi tadviṣayakasaṅketagrahaṇasya pūrvaṃ jātatvāttaddvārakaḥ padārthānāṃ nimittatvavyapadeso na virudhyate
GK16andhvc1u:2942: upalabhyate hi gṛhūtasaṅketasya pratipattur'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityādiyākyaścavaṇānantarameva
GK16andhvc1u:2945: tasyāḥ pāryantikārthapratīteḥ anusaraṇe svamatena nirvahaṇe yadupayogi /
GK16andhvc1u:2946: yadvā-tadanusaraṇe padārtānāṃ pāryantikārthasyāsaṅketitasya kathamavagamo bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2947: kiñca pūrvaṃ padārtheṣu saṅketagrahamapi na ghaṭata ityāha--na cāpīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2952: tathābhāvaḥ pṛthak pṛthak padārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇasya bhavanam /
GK16andhvc1u:2961: padārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇasya nimittatā bhavatu mā veti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2970: sajātīyāḥ vākyārthapratītyaṅgatvena sajātīyāḥ ye tadvikalpāḥ padārthaviṣayakapratyayāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2977: taduttīrṇatve tu sarvaṃ parameśvarādvayaṃ brahyotyasmacchāstrakāreṇa na na viditaṃ tatvālokagranthaṃ viracayatetyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:2984: abhyastaḥ bhūyo bhūyaḥ paryālocito viṣayo yayoste /
GK16andhvc1u:2985: yadvā-abhyaste viṣaye dhūmādihetau gavādyarthe ca yo vyāptisamayayoḥ vahnyādisādhyavyāptigavādipadasaṅketayoḥ smṛtī,
GK16andhvc1u:2998: śrutyādipadārthāstadudāharaṇāni cāpodevīyādau kāvyapradīpādau ca grante prapañcitāni /
GK16andhvc1u:3003: etannimittatāvaicitryañca abhidhāyā dīrghadīrghatvāṅgīkāre nopapadya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3014: locanam yattu bhaṭṭanāyakenoktam--iha dṛptasiṃhādipadaprayoge ca dhārmikapadaprayoge
GK16andhvc1u:3023: tasya ca śabdavācyatvaṃ tenāpi nopagatamiti bālapriyā yatvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3029: śvamāraṇanimittabhramaṇavidhisiddhaṃ dhārmikabhīrutvaṃ vinā niṣedhārtho na sidhyatīti dhārmiketyādyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3049: etasya vākyasya sambandhinau etau vā yau vaktṛpratipattṛviśeṣau saṅketasthānaparirakṣaṇotsukakāminībhīrudhārmikau,
GK16andhvc1u:3055: tasyāstitvamātraṃ na niṣedhāvagatiṃ prati hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3056: kathaṃ boddhavye dhārmike bhayānakarasāveśa ityata āha--tasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3073: tarhi vaktṛpratipattṛpratibhāprāṇito dhvananavyāpāraḥ kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3074: kiṃ ca vastudhvaniṃ dūṣayatā rasadhvanistadanugrāhakaḥ samarthyata iti suṣṭhutarāṃ dhvanidhvaṃso 'yam /
GK16andhvc1u:3078: atha vastumātradhvaneretadudāharaṇaṃ na yuktamityucyate tathāpi kāvyodāharaṇatvāddvāvapyatra dhvanī staḥ, ko doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3079: yadi tu rasānuvedhena vinā na tuṣyati,
GK16andhvc1u:3097: uktanayenāpasiddhāntāpātādapi rasāveśakṛtā niṣedhāvagatiriti vaktuṃ na śakyamityupahāsamukhenāha--kiñcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3099: bhayānakavibhāvādīnabhidadhatyā tadrasāveśaśaktisahakāriṇyā abhidhayā arthādabhihita evāyaṃ niṣedha ityabhiprāyeṇa dūṣayatetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3105: rasasya prādhānyameva darśitaṃ na tu vastudhvanerdūṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3125: tathā tasyaivābhilāṣasya ucitāḥ sambhogānuguṇyādviśiṣṭāśca ye kākvādayaḥ anubhāvāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3128: tasyānuvedha locanam rasasyālaukikatvāttāvanmātrādeva cānavagamātprathamaṃ nirvivādasiddhaviviktavidhiniṣedhapradarśanābhiprāyeṇa caitadvastudhvanerudāharaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16andhvc1u:3140: yaḥ pūrvaṃ karṇopakarṇikayā tvayāpyākarṇito godāvarīkacchagahane prativasatīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3156: sa ca pramāṇena kenāpi na siddho loke,
GK16andhvc1u:3158: atastatpratipādanārthamārabhamāṇena tadupoddhātatayā prathamaṃ vastudhvanyādikamanyadeva vācyādbhinnatvena pradarśanīyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:3169: 'adye'ti padaṃ pūrvaṃ bidhiḥ pratikūlo 'bhūdidānīṃ tu bhavadbhāgyamahimnānukūlo jāta ityarthaṃ dyotayatītyaha--diṣṭyati /
GK16andhvc1u:3179: saṅketasthānarakṣaṇārtamanyāpadeśena vavacidvācye pratiṣedharūpe vidhirūpo yathā-- attā ettha ṇimajjai etya ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16andhvc1u:3180: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16andhvc1u:3181: locana.m dṛptatvāttato gahanānnissaratīti prasiddhagodāvarītīraparisarānusaraṇamapi tāvatkathāśeṣībhūtaṃ kā kathā tallatāgahanapraveśaśaṅkayeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3183: śvaśrūratra śete athavā nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya /
GK16andhvc1u:3185: maha iti nipāto 'nekārtavṛttiratrāvayorityarthe na tu mameti /
GK16andhvc1u:3186: evaṃ hi viśeṣavacanameva śaṅkākāri bhavediti pracchannābhyupagamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3188: niṣedhadvāreṇa tayābhyupagata iti niṣedhābhāvo 'tra bālapriyā pūrvaṃ svairiṇyai vṛttānto
GK16andhvc1u:3190: nanvevaṃ kimiti svayamuktamityata āha--sa cādhunā tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:3194: dharmikasya śaṅgā mā bhūditi 'gaude'tyādyanuvādapūrvakaṃsiṃhasya dṛptatvādiviśeṣo bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3203: evaṃ hi pracchannābhyupagamo na syāditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3223: kākvādisahāyasya ca tāvati dhvananameva vyāpāra iti dhvanerbhūṣaṇametat /
GK16andhvc1u:3225: atha yadyapi bhavānmadanaśarāsāradīryamāṇahṛdaya upekṣituṃ na yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3239: samucite sambhogayogye samaye rātrau bhaviṣyatītyātmanā sambhāvyamāno yo 'rthaḥ tannimittakā ye vikarāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3259: anurāgātirekeṇa sambhāvito ya āvayoranibhṛtaḥ sambhogaḥ tasya parihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3261: upekṣituṃ na yukta ityanena svasyābhilāṣo 'pi pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3264: 'diasaam' ityasya kathaṃ prathamāntatayā vyākhyānamityata āha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3265: na copekṣe kvacidvācye vidhirūpe 'nubhayarūpo yathā--- vacca maha vvia ekkei hontu ṇīsāsaroiavvāiṃ /
GK16andhvc1u:3266: mā tujja vi tīa viṇā dakkhiṇṇahaassa jāantu //
GK16andhvc1u:3268: pratipannamātrāyāṃ ca rātrāvandhībhūto madīyāyāṃ śayyāyāṃ māṃ śliṣaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3271: mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇyahatasya janiṣata //
GK16andhvc1u:3276: kevalaṃ pūrvakṛtānupālanātmanā dākṣiṇyenaikarūpatvābhimānenaiva bālapriyā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3296: 'sthita iti yat tat kevalaṃ dākṣiṇyenaive'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3299: pūrvakṛtena pūrvakarmaṇā addaṣṭena hetunā yadanupālanaṃ matpālanam /
GK16andhvc1u:3300: yadvā-pūrvakṛtaṃ yaddākṣiṇyaṃ tasyānupālanamavicchedena pālanaṃ tadātmanā dākṣiṇyena /
GK16andhvc1u:3304: ahisāriāṇaṃ vigdhaṃ karosi aṇaṇāṇaṃ vi haāse //
GK16andhvc1u:3325: nivartasvetyanena māgama ityarthasyoktatayā gamananiṣedho vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3328: locanam nāyake sata tataḥ pratigantuṃ pravṛttā,
GK16andhvc1u:3330: na kevalaṃ svātmano mama ca nirvṛtividhnaṃ karoṣi,
GK16andhvc1u:3332: tatastava na kadācana sukhalavalābho 'pi bhaviṣyatītyata eva hatāśāsīti vallabhābhiprāyarupaścāṭuviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3333: yadi vā sakhyopadiśyamānāpi tadavadhīraṇayā gacchantī sakhyocyate-na kevalamātmano vidhnaṃ karoṣi,
GK16andhvc1u:3338: punarapi vācya eva viśrānterguṇībhūtavyaṅgyabhedasya preyorasavadalaṅkārasyodāharaṇamidaṃ syāt, na dhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3378: kassa vaṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharam /
GK16andhvc1u:3380: anyāsāñca vidhnaṃ karoṣi tava cepsitalābho bhaviṣyatīti kā pratyāśā /
GK16andhvc1u:3382: tvadīyaṃ vā gacchāvetyubhayatrāpi tātparyādanubhayarūpo vallabhābipārāyascāṭvātmā vyaṅgya ityateyeva vyavatiṣṭate /
GK16andhvc1u:3384: tatra hatāśe ityāmantraṇādi yuktamayuktaṃ veti sahṛdayā eva pramāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:3386: adhunā tu viṣayabhedādapi vyaṅgyasya vācyādbheda ityāha--kvacidvācyāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:3388: viṣayabhedo 'pi vicitrarūpo vyavatiṣṭamānaḥ sahṛdayairvyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3389: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam /
GK16andhvc1u:3401: anyāsāṃ ca tvadgṛhagamanotsukasya mama ceti cakārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3403: ata eva yata evaṃrūpo vācyārthaḥ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3404: 'madīyaṃ gṛhamāgaccha tvadīyaṃ vā gṛhaṅgacchāveti cāṭavātmā vallabhābhiprāyo vyaṅgya' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3408: atra pakṣe 'nivartasve' tyasya tavādhvavasāyānnivartasveti vācyārthe bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3410: pakṣe 'smin taṭasthānāṃ nāyikāpremābāvātteṣāṃ vacanaṃ na pravartakaṃ ,
GK16andhvc1u:3411: na vā nivartakamataḥ pūrvoktavyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatvaṃ neti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3413: nanu vṛttau 'vyavasthāpita' ityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchate vyavasthāpanasyāniṣpannatvādityato vyācaṣṭe--viṣayabhedo 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3416: 'kasya ve'ti vākāro 'vadhāraṇārthaṅko dṛṣṭvetyuttaraṃ thojya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---dṛṣṭvaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3419: anye caivaṃprakārā vācyādvibhedinaḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ sambhavanti /
GK16andhvc1u:3423: sabhramarapajhāghrāmaśīle śīlaṃ hi kathañcidapi vārayituṃ na śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3427: atrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ---kācidavinītā kutaścitkhaṇḍitādharā niścitatatsavidhasaṃnidhāne tadbhartari tamanavalokamānayeva kayācidvidagdhasakhyā tadvācyatāparihārāyaivamucyate
GK16andhvc1u:3431: tasyāṃ ca priyatamena gāḍhamupārabyamānāyāṃ tahyalīkaśaṅkitaprātiveśakalokaviṣayaṃ saubhāgyātiśayakhyāpanaṃ priyāyā iti śabdabalāditi sapatnīviṣayaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3434: kenāpi kāraṇena pragaddaṣṭaviśeṣavattayā pramukhataḥ savraṇatayā vilokyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3435: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kṛtaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3436: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kutaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3439: ukte vācyārthe sthite vakṣyamāṇo vyaṅgyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3458: tasya bharturvyalīkamapriyamanayā kṛtamiti śaṅkito yaḥ prātiveśikalokastadviṣayamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3478: tṛtīyastu rasādilakṣaṇaḥ prabhedo vācyasāmarthyākṣiptaḥ locanam lāghavamātmani grahītuṃ na yuktaṃ;
GK16andhvc1u:3482: punaḥ prakaṭaradanadaṃśanavidhirna vidheya iti taccauryakāmukaviṣayasambodhanaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3486: dvitīyoddyote 'asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ krameṇoddyotitaḥ paraḥ' iti vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dvitīyaprabhedavarṇanāvasare /
GK16andhvc1u:3487: yathā hi vidhiniṣedhatadanubhayātmanā rūpeṇa saṃkalayya vastudhvaniḥ saṃkṣepeṇa suvacaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3508: na hyetatsarvaṃ svotprekṣāmātreṇoktamapi tu vidhidhamavasthāpito 'vyavasthāpita' iti vṛttigranthānurodhenetyāha---tadetadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3509: nanu vastudhvanivadalaṅkāradhvanerapyatraiva pradarśanīyatve kimityagre darśayiṣyata ityuktamityatastātparyamāha-yathā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3534: tanmayībhavanadaśāyāṃ tu raterevāsvādyateti śṛṅgārataiva bhāti paurvāparyavivekāvadhāraṇena 'dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śutim' ityādau /
GK16andhvc1u:3536: tadaṅgaṃ bhāvābhāsaścittavṛtteḥ praśama eva prakāntayā hṛdayamāhlādayati yato viśeṣeṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:3538: yathā-- ekasmin śayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyato- ranyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16andhvc1u:3541: na cāyaṃ rasādirarthaḥ 'putraste jātaḥ' ityato yathā harṣo jāyate tathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3543: api tu sahṛdayasya hṛdayasaṃvādabalādvibhāvānubhāvapratītau bālapriyā vibhāvābhāsajñānadvārā sthāyyābhāsaniścayenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3554: bhāvaśabdenaiva bhāvapraśamasyāpi grahaṇasambhavāt kimiti pṛthak tadgrahaṇamityata āha-cittavṛtterityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3570: yadvyāvṛttaṃ vyāvartanaṃ tena ca sahitaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yatra, tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3576: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣiptaḥ prakāśata' ityanena darśitaṃ vibhāvādivyaṅgyatvaṃ rasādeḥ sādhayiṣyan ādau tasya tātparyaśaktigamyatvaṃ niṣedhati---na cetyādi tathetyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3580: na tu sākṣācchabdavyāpāraviṣaya iti vācyādvibhinna eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3581: tathā hi vācyatvaṃ tasya svaśabdaniveditatvena vā syāt vibhāvādipratipādanamukhena vā /
GK16andhvc1u:3583: locanam tanmayībhāvenāsvādyamāna eva rasyamānataikaprāṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvasukhādivilakṣaṇaḥ parisphurati /
GK16andhvc1u:3586: vibhāvādyarthe 'pi na putrajanmaharṣanyāyena tāṃ cittavṛttiṃ janayatīti jananātirikto 'rthasyāpi vyāpāro dhvananamevocyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3591: tatra svaśabdasyānvayavyatirekau rasyamānatāsāraṃ rasaṃ prati nirākurvandhvananasyaiva
GK16andhvc1u:3592: tāviti bālapriyā tathā kāvyaṃ vibhāvādyarthapratipādanadvārā tātparyaśaktyā rasacarvaṇāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3607: siddhasvabhāvā ye sukhādayo bhāvāḥ sukhapadena ratirvivakṣitā /
GK16andhvc1u:3614: athārthasyāpi dhvananameva vyāpāra iti janakatvaniṣedhapūrvakaṃ darśayati-vibhāvādyartho 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3630: na hi kevalaśṛṅgarādibdamātrabhāji locanam darśayati--na ca sarvatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:3631: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya--- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc1u:3632: dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṣṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:3640: tathā hiyāte dvāravatīṃ tadā madhuripau taddattajhampānatāṃ bālapriyā vyabhicāraviṣayamudāharati---yaditi /
GK16andhvc1u:3657: teṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ ta eva vā ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3658: teṣāmucitā yāścittavṛttayaḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpāstāsāṃ vāsanābhiranurañjitāyā rūṣitāyāssvasaṃvido yā ānandamayī carvaṇā tasyāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3662: atrābhilāṣo mahāvākyena cintādayastvavānravākyena vyajyanta iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3664: yadi lakṣye svaśabdena rasādipratītistarhyanvayaḥ syānna tu svaśabdenāto 'nvayābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3676: utkamityanena tūktānubhāvānukarṣaṇaṃ katuṃ sotkaṇṭhāśabdaḥ prayukta ityanuvādo 'pi nānarthakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3677: punaranubhāvapratipādane hi punaruktiratanmayībhāvo vā na tu tatkṛtetyatra hetumāha---viṣāyāntara iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3678: 'yadviśramya' bālapriyā dattā yā jhampā vegenordhvādideśādāsphālanapūrvakapatanakriyā viharaṇakālabhavā tayā /
GK16andhvc1u:3681: 'sampannate'ti pāṭhe tena dattā sampāditā sampannatā puṣpapallavādisamṛddhiryasyāstāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3687: guruṇā prabhūtena bāṣpeṇa ruddhakaṇṭhatayā gadgadaṃ yathā tathā galan prasaran tāra uccaistaśca svaro yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3709: kevalaśabdanātra vibhāvānubhāvau prati sahakāritvamapi neti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:3711: ayamarthaḥ---jalacāriṇāṃ kūjite 'pi gurubāṣpetyādyuktānubhāvānāṃ saṃyojana eva tanmayībhavanayukatyā tadutkaṇṭhāyāścarvaṇāgocaratvaṃ bhavati
GK16andhvc1u:3715: sati ca pūrvavākye sotkaṇṭhāśabde tatsaṃgṛhītānāmanubhāvānāṃ sotkaṇṭhāsamānārthakotkaśabdena pratipādanaṃ bhavatīti sotkaṇṭhāśabdassaprayojana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3720: yataśca svābhidhānamantareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiṣṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3725: na hi yadabhāve 'pi yadbhavati tatkṛtaṃ taditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3734: evaṃ svaśabdena saha rasādervyatirekānvayābhāvamupapatyā pradarśya tathaivopasaṃharati-yataścetyādinā kathañcidityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3735: abhidheyameva sāmarthyaṃ sahakāriśaktirūpaṃ vibhāvādikaṃ rasadhvanane śabdasya kartavye,
GK16andhvc1u:3737: cānumānavyatirikte dhvanane kartavye sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ viśiṣṭasamucito vācakasākalyamiti
GK16andhvc1u:3742: yena siddhavannirdeśa ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimatasyaiva kāvyarūpatvaprasañjanābhiprāyeyamuktirityāha---tava mata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3743: svaśabdakṛtā rasādipratītiḥ na vibhāvādikṛtetyasmin mate kāvyatvenānabhimatamapi kāvyamāpadyetetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3752: karmadhārayāśrayaṇena śabde yojayitvā ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣāśrayeṇārthe yojayati---abhidheyasya yetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3756: na tathā vibhāvādyartho rasaṃ janayatīti tadvilakṣṇatvamarthagatadhvananasya /
GK16andhvc1u:3760: guṇālaṅkārādiviśiṣṭena samucitena rasānuguṇena ca vācakena iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyādbhinna eveti sthitam /
GK16andhvc1u:3762: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
GK16andhvc1u:3771: vibhāvānubhāvapratipādake hi vākye tātparyaśaktirbhede saṃsarge vā paryavasyet;
GK16andhvc1u:3772: na tu rasyamānatāsāre rase ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:3776: ivaśabdena vidyamāno 'pi kramo na saṃlakṣyata iti taddarśayati--agra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3780: sa eveti pratīyamānamātre 'pi prakrānte tṛtīya eva rasadhvaniriti mantavyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:3797: lakṣaṇanuktvā tasyātmatvapratipādikāyāḥ kārikāyāḥ kā saṅgatirityato vṛttānuvādapurassaraṃ tāṃ darśayati--evamityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:3807: locanam tena rasa eva vastuta ātmā,
GK16andhvc1u:3808: vastvalaṅkāradhvanī tu sarvathā rasaṃ pratiparyavasyete iti vācyādutkṛṣṭau tāvityabhiprāyeṇa 'dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātme'ti sāmānyenoktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3810: krauñcasya dvandvaviyogena sahacarīhananodbhūtena sāhacaryadhvaṃsanenotthito yaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvo nirapekṣabhāvatvādvipralambhaśṛṅgārocitaratisthāyibhāvādanya
GK16andhvc1u:3835: krauñcetyādikaṃ vyākhyāya śokasya ślokatāprāptiṃ vivṛṇoti---sa evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3836: krauñce tātasya śokasya vāsanārūpeṇādikavau sthitasya śokasya cābhedabuddhikṛtamaikyaṃ vivakṣitvā sa evetyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3849: prāptaḥ-- mā niṣāda pratiṣṭāṃ tvaṃmagamaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3852: na tu muneḥ śoka iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3853: evaṃ hi sati tadduḥkhena so 'pi duḥkhita iti kṛtvā rasasyātmateti niravakāśaṃ bhavet /
GK16andhvc1u:3859: svasya carvayituścittasya yā dgutistanmayībhāvajanitā pulakādibhirlakṣyamāṇā tayā samāsvādyo manasānubhāvyaḥ sāraḥ prāṇo yasyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:3860: kathamātmabhūtasya rasasya bahiḥślokatayā pariṇāma iti śaṅkāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntenottaramāha---rasetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3869: na ca samayasavyapekṣapravṛttikasya śabdasya tadviṣayatvaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkāmanuvadan vyaṅgyatvena tadviṣayatvaṃ darśayati--samayānapekṣatve 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3871: loke hi vilāpapraśaṃsādayo vacanaprakārāḥ śokabahumānarūpāṃ cittavṛttiṃ vyañjayantītyuktarītyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3877: samucitā eva śabdādayo rasādīn vyañjayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3878: ādikaveḥ ślokatvamāgata ityevaṃ vyākhyāyādikaveḥ śoka ityanvayabhramaṃ nirasyati---na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3890: evamuktaprakāreṇa carvaṇocitaḥ śokasthāyibhāva evātmā yasya tathā bhūto yaḥ karuṇarasastasya vividhavācyavācakaracanāprapañjacāruṇaḥ kāvyasya sa evārthaḥ sārabhūtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3891: locanam eva kāvyasyātmā sārabhūtasvabhāvo 'paraśāvdavailakṣaṇyakārakaḥ etadevoktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe--'yāvatpūrṇo na caitena tāvannaiva vamatyamum' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3894: tena yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- śabdaprādhānyamāśritya tatra śāstraṃ pṛthagviduḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3901: vividhaṃ tattadabhivyañjanīyarasānuguṇyena vicitraṃ kṛtvā bālapriyā samuccalanaṃ bahiḥ prasaraṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya 'mā niṣāde'tyādiślokasya tasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3904: yato 'mā niṣāde'tyādikāvyaṃ karuṇarasasamuccalanasvarūpamataḥ kāvyasya rasa evātmeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3912: naiva vamati bahirbhāvamāpādya parāsvādanīyaṃ naiva karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:3914: kāvyarūpeṇa rasamudgiratīti rasavamanarūpasya kāvyasya rasarūpatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3915: svena vilikhite 'mā niṣāde'tyādau 'agama' ityaḍāgamasya “namāṅyoga' iti niṣedhaśaṅkāyāmupapattimāha--agama ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3932: vividhaṃ vācyavācakaracanāsu prapañjena cāru iti vigrahamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---tattadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3936: tathā cādikarvarvālmīkeḥ nihatasahacarīvirahakātarakrauñcākrandajanitaḥ śoka eva ślokatayā pariṇataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3937: locanam vācye vācake racanāyāṃ ca prapañcena yaccāru śabdārthālaṅkāraguṇayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3938: tena sarvatrāpi dhvananasadbhāve 'pi na tathā vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3941: yaduktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe---'sarvatra tarhi kāvyavyavahāraḥ syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3958: nanu nihatetyādiyathāśrutagranthena tadākrandajanito muneśśoka ityartha iva pagratīyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3962: nanu śokacarvaṇāto yadi śloka udbhūtastatpratīyamānaṃ vastu kāvyasyātmeti kuta ityāśaṅkyāha---śoko hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3964: śoke hi sthāyibhāve ye vibhāvānubhāvāstatsamucitā cittavṛttiścarvyamāṇātmā rasa ityaucityātsthāyino rasatāpattirityucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3965: prāksvasaṃviditaṃ paratrānumitaṃ ca cittavṛttijātaṃ bālapriyā pūrvaṃ tanniṣedha ityato vyācaṣṭe---carvaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3967: śoka ityasya vāsanārūpeṇa sthito muneḥ śoka ityarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3977: 'śokaḥ śloktvamāgataḥ' iti śokacarvaṇātaḥ ślokotpattivacanenaiva rasasyātmavaṃ prakāśitameva śokacarvaṇāgocarātmatvātkaruṇarasasyeti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:3978: nanu kathamanyacarvaṇāyā anyo viṣayaḥ syādityata upapādayatiśoke hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3983: śokādernimittabhūtā ye vibhāvāḥ kāryabhūtā ye anubhavāścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4002: svānubhavasaṃskāraṃ svānumānasaṃskāraṃ cādhāya tābhyāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādamādadhānaṃ sadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4005: locanam saṃskārakrameṇa hṛdayasaṃvādamāda dhānaṃ carvaṇāyāmupayujyate yataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4006: nanu pratīyamānarūpamātmā tatra tribhedaṃ pratipāditaṃ na tu rasaikarūpam,
GK16andhvc1u:4009: bhāvagrahaṇena vyabhicāriṇo 'pi carvyamāṇasya tāvanmātrāviśrāntāvapi sthāyicarvaṇāparyavasānocitarasapratiṣṭāmanavāpyāpi prāṇatvaṃ bhavatītyuktam
GK16andhvc1u:4010: yathā--- nakhaṃ nakhāgrema vighaṭṭayantī vivartayantī valayaṃ vilolam /
GK16andhvc1u:4033: stāyicarvaṇāyāṃ yatparyavasānaṃ tatpūrṇatākaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadeva ucitarasapratiṣṭā tāmaprāpyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4040: cābhivyajyamānāyā lajjāyāḥ śṛṅgāraniṣṭāmanavāpya carvaṇāgocarībhavantyāḥ prāṇatvamityāha--atra lajjāyā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4052: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:4054: sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:4056: tat vastutattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī alokasāmānyaṃ locanam evamitihāsamukhena
GK16andhvc1u:4061: yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- vāgdhenurdugdha etaṃ hi rasaṃ yadbālatṛṣṇāyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4062: bālapriyā athedamālocanīyaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ---śrīvālmīkinā “mā niṣāde“tyādiślokena ślokāntaraiśca sahacarasya puṃsa eva krauñcasya nihananaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
GK16andhvc1u:4064: sahacarīhananodbhūtene'ti 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' iti ca vyākhyānena locanakṛtā,
GK16andhvc1u:4067: atra kecit--'nihate'tyādivṛttigranthasya 'nihataḥ sahacarīvirahakātaraḥ svata eva sahacarīvirahāsahiṣṇuśca yaḥ krauñca
GK16andhvc1u:4070: 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' ityasya “nihatasahacarī“tyādigranthena vibhāvaḥ pradarśita ityarthaśceti na rāmāyaṇavacanavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4095: bālatṛṣṇayā locanam tena nāsya ramaḥ sa syādduhyate yogibhirhi yaḥ // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4097: ata eva--- yaṃ sarvaśaulāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16andhvc1u:4108: tena tasmāddhetoḥ saḥ asya bālatṛṣṇayā prasnatasya rasasya,
GK16andhvc1u:4118: ata eva yato rasaparipūrṇāyāstadāveśaparavaśāyā dhenoḥ prasnavanaṃ prati svayaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:4119: hibhavataḥ vatsarūpasyeti yāvat. 'ata eva ityanena himavataḥ sārāgṣapātratvamuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4131: pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaṃ karotīti kārikārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4139: yenāsminnativicitrakaviparamparāvāhini saṃsāre kālidāsaprabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahākavaya iti gaṇyante /
GK16andhvc1u:4142: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
GK16andhvc1u:4146: yadi ca vācyarūpa locanam yadāha muniḥ---'kaverantargataṃ bhāvaṃ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4148: abhivyaktena sphuratā pratibhāviśeṣeṇa nimittena mahākavitvagaṇaneti yāvat // .6 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4152: vedyata bālapriyā rasāveśasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ yadvaiśadyaṃ rasāveśānabhimukhatvarāhityaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4157: abivyaktena ata eva sphuratā pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:4163: tathā ca kārikā evāsāvarthaḥ syāttadvācyavāṭacakarūpaparijñānādeva tatpratītiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4164: atha ca vācyavācakalakṣaṇamātrakṛtaśramāṇāṃ kāvyatattvārthabhāvanāvimukhānāṃ svaraśrutyādilakṣaṇamivāpragītānāṃ gāndharvalakṣaṇavidāmagocara evāsāvarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4168: kāvyasya tattvabhūto yo 'rthastasya bhāvanā vācyātirekeṇānavaratacarvaṇā tatra vimukhānām /
GK16andhvc1u:4170: śrutirnāma śabdasya vailakṣaṇyamātrakāri yadrūpāntaraṃ tatparimāṇā svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitā dvāviśatividhā /
GK16andhvc1u:4174: nyaṅgyārthabodhe tu sahṛdayatvādirūpā ca sāmagrī pūrvottarārdhābhyāṃ darśitā ceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4175: vedane siddhe tatsāmagrīcintāvakāśa ityāśyena punarapi vedyata ityuktam,
GK16andhvc1u:4188: kārikāyāṃ 'sa hī'tyatra sa tviti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4195: gītādiśabdaśravaṇe sati tasya śabdasya yadrūpāntaraṃ lavādikālāṃśaṃ nimittīkṛtya jāyate tadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4197: tat parimāmaṃ kālapramāṇaṃ yasyāḥ setyarthaḥ. tanmātrakāleti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:4199: svaraḥ tasya svarasyāntarālamubhayamarthātpārśvadvayaṃ ca teṣāṃ yo bhedastatkalpitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4206: śravaṇārthasya dhātoḥ ktin pratyaye śrūyanta iti vyutpattyā śrūtiśabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4207: atra nādāparaparyāyaśrutivibhāgaviṣaye bahavaḥ prakārā varttante---kecana dvāviṃśatiṃ śrutīrmanyante,
GK16andhvc1u:4210: ata evoktaṃ kohalena--- dvāviṃśatiṃ kecidudāharanti śrutīḥ śrutijñānavicāradakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4214: etāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ mitho bhedaḥ--viṇādaṇḍe pūrvottarabāvena dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpya
GK16andhvc1u:4218: svataḥ sahakārikāraṇanirapekṣaṃ rañjayati śrotṛcittamanuraktaṃ karotīti svaraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4220: saptānāmapyamīṣāṃ svarāṇāṃ vyastānāṃ satāṃ dṛṣṭāddaṣṭaphalaupayikatvaṃ na bhavatīti tatsiddhaye grāmasyāvaśyakatā jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4228: tatraikasman vīṇādaṇḍe dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpaya āditasturīyāyāṃ tantryāṃ ṣaṅjasvaraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4234: dvāviṃśyāṃ niṣādaśceti svareṣu vinyasteṣu ṣaṅjagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4242: dvāviśyāṃ gāndhāraśceti vinyasteṣu svareṣu madhyamagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4249: niṣādagandhārau dvābhyāmutpannāvita dvaigrāmikyo dvāviṃśyaḥ śrutayaḥ svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitāḥ siddhāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4260: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati--- locanam mārgā gṛhyante /
GK16andhvc1u:4261: prakṛṣṭaṃ gītaṃ gānaṃ yeṣāṃ te pragītāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4273: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //
GK16andhvc1u:4280: sarvo hi tathā yatate itīyatā prādhānye lokasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4282: pratyabhijñeyaśabdenedamāha--- 'kāvyaṃ tu jātu jāyeta kasthacitpratibhāvataḥ' iti nayena yadyapi svayamasyaitatparisphurati,
GK16andhvc1u:4296: 'sahṛdayaiḥ so 'rthaḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdasca mahākavestau śabdārtho yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4298: etau mahākaveḥ tau tāddaśau śabdārthāvityākārakasahṛdayapratyabhijñānārhāvityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4299: atha tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvityarthāntaraṃ ca grāhyamityāha---niyogetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4324: locanam yathoktamasmatparamagurubhiḥ śrīmadutpalapādaiḥ-- taistairapyupayācitairupanatastanvyāḥ sthito 'pyantike kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
GK16andhvc1u:4325: lokasyaiṣa tathānavekṣitaguṇaḥ svātmāpi viśveśvaro naivālaṃ nijavaibhavāya tadiyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā ḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4331: evaṃ vyaṅgyasyārthasya vyañjakasya śabdasya ca prādhānyaṃ vadatā vyaṅkyavyañjakabhāvasyāpi bālapriyā taistairiti /
GK16andhvc1u:4332: sāmānyato 'vagatasyāpīśvarasya viśeṣato 'vagamamantareṇa na phalaparyantībhāvalābha ityartapradarśanaparo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4337: evamaparijñātaḥ yo mayā lokottarasaundaryādiguṇaviśiṣṭatvena śrutastata eva rāgātiśayena prarthitasca sa kānto 'yamiti viśeṣeṇājñātaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4347: tasmāt svataḥ sphuritayorapi śabdārthayoḥ mahākavinā yuktameva pratyabhijñānakaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4348: tarhi ko 'tra pratyabhijñāpadārtha ityata uktaphalatayā tatsvrūpamāha---tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4351: vṛttau 'mahākavestau śabdārthau sahṛdayaiḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4352: mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñetyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4358: dhvaniriti idānīṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yadvācyavācakāveva prathamamupādadate kavayastadapi yuktamevetyāha--
GK16andhvc1u:4360: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
GK16andhvc1u:4363: yathā hyālokārthī sannapi dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjano bhavati tadupāyatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:4365: tadvadyvaṅgyamarthaṃ pratyāddato jano vācye 'rthe yatnavān bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4366: locanam prādhānyamuktamiti dhvanati dhvanyate dhvananamiti tritayamapyupapannamityuktam // .8 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4368: prathamamupādānaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyema viruddho 'yaṃ prādhānye sādhye heturiti darśayati--idānīmityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:4377: prathamopādīyamānatvahetoḥ ko doṣa ityataḥ so 'pi darśita ityāha---upāyānāmevetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4386: anena pratipādakasya kavervyaṅgyamarthaṃ prati vyāpāro darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4392: yathā hi padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamastathā vācyārthapratītipūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4395: anena ślokenātyantasahṛdayo yo na bhavati tasyaiṣa sphuṭasaṃvedya eva kramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4396: yathātyantaśabdavṛttajño yo na bhavati tasya padārthavākyārthakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4397: kāṣṭāprāptasahṛdayabhāvasta tu vākyavṛttakuśalasyeva sannapi kramo 'bhyastānumānāvinābhāvasmṛtyādivadasaṃvedya iti darśitam // .10 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4424: abhyaste viṣaye anumānamanumitiḥ avinābhāvasmṛtiḥ vyāptismṛtiḥ tayoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4427: idānīṃ vācyārthapratītipūrvakatve 'pi tatpratītervyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati---
GK16andhvc1u:4429: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
GK16andhvc1u:4433: prādhānyādeva tatparyantānusaraṇaraṇaraṇakatvaritā madhye viśrānti na kurvata iti kramasya sāto 'pyalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānye hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4446: tatra raṇaraṇakena autsukyena tvaritāḥ santa ityarthaḥ /
