GK16andhvc1u:4450: tathā ca kā kathā kramaparyālocanāyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4453: 'svasāmarthye'tyasya svasya padārthasya yat sāmarthyaṃ sahakārītyarthābhiprāyeṇa vivṛṇoti--ākāṅkṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4454: kārikāyāṃ 'vyāpāraniṣpattā'viti svavyāpārasya vākyārthapratipādanarūpasya niṣpattau satyāṃ vākyārthabuddhāvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4458: vibhāvanamātraniṣedhena yathā svasāmarthyavaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayannapi padārtho vyāpāraniṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:4464: anena vidyamāna eva kramo na saṃvedyata ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4465: tena yatsphoṭābhiprāyeṇāsanneva krama iti vyācakṣate tatpratyuta viruddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:4466: vācye 'rthe vimukho viśrāntinibandhanaṃ paritoṣamalabhamāna ātmā hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmityanena sacetasāmityasyaivārtho 'bhivyaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4468: na tu kāvyasyāsau kaścidatiśaya ityāśaṅkyāha-avabhāsata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4471: ata eva tṛtīyoddyote ghaṭapradīpaddaṣṭāntabalādvyaṅgyapratītikāle 'pi vācyapratītirna vighaṭata iti yadvakṣyati tena sahāsya granthasya na virodhaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4489: tarhyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tadbuddhereva taddhetutvātsahṛdayānāmeva lorottaraḥ kaścidatiśayo 'yaṃ na kāvyasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4502: na bhāsata iti vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti śeṣaḥ ;
GK16andhvc1u:4507: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayannāha---
GK16andhvc1u:4508: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
GK16andhvc1u:4509: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
GK16andhvc1u:4511: vyaṅktaḥ kāvyaviśeṣaḥ sa dhvaniriti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:4524: 'sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu' bālapriyā na virodha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4536: vyaṅgyasya sadbhāve siddhavi siddha eva tamarithamiti tatpadena parāmarśo yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4541: yatrārtho vācyaviśeṣaḥ vācakaviśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tamarthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4543: anena vācyavācakacārutvahetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaśca locanam iti yaduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4545: vyaṅkta iti dvivacanenadamāha--yadyapyavivakṣitavācye śabda eva vyañjakastathāpyarthasyāpi sahakāritā na truṭyati,
GK16andhvc1u:4548: viśiṣṭaśabdābhidheyatayā vinā tasyārthasyāvyañjakatvāditi sarvatra śabdārthayorubhayorapi dhvananaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4550: arthaḥ śabdo veti tu vikalpābhidhānaṃ prādhānyābhiprāyema /
GK16andhvc1u:4551: kāvyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaścāsau kāvyasya vā viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4553: bālapriyā nanvekaikatra śabdārthayorekaikasyaiva vyañjakatvāt vyaṅkta iti dvivacanamanupapannamityata āha--dvivacanenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4560: yathā gajasyākṣinimīlanaṃ na buddhipūrvakamapi tu svabhāvata evetyavicāro gajanimīlikāśabdena lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4561: nanu yadi samuccayastarhi 'arthaśabdāvi'ti bhāvyamityata āha--artha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4564: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---vākāro 'tra śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanakriyākarttṛtve vikalpasya na bodhakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4565: yena “śiraśśvā kāko vā dgupadatanayo vā parimṛśe“dityādāvivaikavacanaṃ bhavet,
GK16andhvc1u:4566: āpi tu vyañjanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtvenānvitayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanaprādhānye vikalpamavagamayati /
GK16andhvc1u:4567: tathā ca vikalpitavyañjanaprādhānyau śabdārthau vyaṅkta iti vākyārtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4571: 'yo dhvanilakṣaṇa ātmā sa tathāvidhaśabdārthapṛṣṭapātīti kāvyagrahaṇāduktam' iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4574: yaccoktam--'cārutvapratītistarhi kāvyasyātmā syāt' iti tadaṅgīkurma eva /
GK16andhvc1u:4576: yaccoktam---'cāruṇaḥ pratītiryadi kāvyātmā pratyakṣādipramāṇādapi sā bhavantī tathā syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4577: tatra śabdārthamayakāvyātmābhidhānaprastāve ka eṣa prasaṅga iti na kiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc1u:4579: artho vā śabdo vā, vyāpāro vā /
GK16andhvc1u:4582: vyaṅgyo vā dhvanyata iti vyāpāro vā bālapriyā teneti /
GK16andhvc1u:4585: 'pono devadatto divā na bhuṅkta' ityādau rātribhojanādergamyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4587: yadi cārutvahetutayā prāsiddhebhyo guṇādibhyo 'nyaḥ kāvyātmā syāttarhi cārutvapratītireva tadātmāstu,
GK16andhvc1u:4588: tasyāḥ dṛṣṭatvenāddaṣṭavastvantarakalpane gauravāditi tadatirikto na dhvanirityākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4591: cārutvapratītirityasya cārutvapratīterviṣayo heturvā kaścidguṇādibhyo 'nya ityarthasya vaktavyatayā dhvanināmnyena vivāda ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4614: yato lakṣaṇakṛtāmeva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4615: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāri kāvyatattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:4617: kārikayā tu prādhānyena samudāya eva kāvyarūpo mukhyatayā dhvaniriti pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:4630: tathāca saḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdavācyavyaṅgyavyañjanasamudāyātmakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniriti kathitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4642: uktārthopapādanāya 'viśeṣeṇa sinoti badhnāti svasambandhinaṃ padārtham' iti vyutpattimabhipretya viṣayaśabdasyārthamāha--ananyatra bhāva iti
GK16andhvc1u:4647: lakṣaṇapratipādanenaiva prathamābhāvavādimataṃ nirākṛtamityabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛto 'yadapyuktam' ityādinā dvitīyābhāvavādimatadūṣaṇābhidhānamiti pradarśayitumāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4651: ghnanirnāma kāvyaprakāro na kāvyaśabdavācyaḥ prasiddhaprasthānātikrāmitvāditi paramatasya
GK16andhvc1u:4653: vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpamabhipretya yata ityādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitamiti vyācaṣṭe---lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4660: vācyavācakamātrāśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgyavyañjakasamāśrayema vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ kathamantarbhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4678: bālapriyā guṇādivyatiriktasya tasya nṛttādiprāyatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirākaroti--yaccetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4685: gauṇo vā kāvyasya citrapadena vyavahāra ityāha--kāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4688: viṣṇavādyanukāritvamālekhyamātratvaṃ kalārūpatvaṃ ca lokaprasiddhacitrāṇāmastīti tadyogātkāvye citraśabdapravṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4699: nanu yatra pratiyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūddhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4705: guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaramabhivyanakti sa dhvaniriti /
GK16andhvc1u:4710: abhihitamiti bhūtaprayoga ādau vyaṅkta ityasya vyākhyātatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4715: prādhānyaṃ ca yadyapi jñaptau na cakāsti;
GK16andhvc1u:4717: tathāpi vivecakairjīvitānveṣaṇe kriyamāṇe yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ punarapi vācyamevānuprāṇayannāste tadā tadupakaraṇatvādeva tasyālaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc1u:4720: tathāpi madhyakakṣāniviṣṭo 'sau vyahgyo 'rtho bālapriyā kārikāyāmanuktasyādhikasyāpekṣitasyārthasyāvāpaḥ prakṣepaḥ taṃ kartumityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4730: tadrahito 'khaṇḍastāddaśasya vākyārthībhūtasya rasādivyaṅgyasya carvaṇāyāṃ viśrānteḥ sahṛdayamanasāṃ viśrānterityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4735: yaḥ pūrvaṃ vācyāduttīrmastadvyaṅgyatvātsakakṣyāntarahgato 'pi punaḥ pūrvabhāvirnī vācyakakṣyāṃ praviśya vācyamevānuprāṇayanyadā āste ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4748: yadā punarvyaṅgyo 'rtho vācyenopaskṛtaḥ kāvyamanuprāṇaṭayannāste tadā tasmāccamatkāralābha ityanenārthāt sidhyati /
GK16andhvc1u:4752: samāsoktau tāvat---- upoḍharāgema vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
GK16andhvc1u:4753: yathā samastaṃ timiśaṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16andhvc1u:4754: ityāda.u vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyameva prādhānyena pratīyate locanam na rasonmukhībhavati;
GK16andhvc1u:4755: svātantryeṇāpi tu vācyamevārtha saṃskartuṃ dhāvatīti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatokta /
GK16andhvc1u:4759: ityatra samāsokterlakṣaṇasvarūpaṃ hetirnāma tannirvacanamiti pādacatuṣṭayena kramāduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4770: rāgādraktatvāt sandhyākṛtādanantaraṃ premarūpācca bālapriyā prathamāvācyasya dvitīyā vastuvyaṅgyasya tṛtīyā rasadhvaneśca kakṣeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4776: atra niśāśaśivṛttāntaḥ prākāraṇikatvādvācyo nāyakavṛttāntastvaprākaraṇikatvādvyaṅgya ityabhipretya samānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ vivṛṇoti--upoḍha ityādinā
GK16andhvc1u:4802: timirasaṃvalitāṃśudarśane hi rātrimukhamiti lokena lakṣyate na tu sphuṭa āloke /
GK16andhvc1u:4805: atra ca nāyakena paścādgatena cumbanopakrame puro nīlāṃśukasya galanaṃ patanam /
GK16andhvc1u:4806: yadi vā 'puro 'gre nāyakena tathā gṛhītaṃ mukham' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4808: tathāhi nāyakavyavahāro niśāśaśināveva śṛṅgāravibhāvarūpau saṃskurvāṇo 'laṅkāratāṃ bhajate,
GK16andhvc1u:4811: na cācetanāyāḥ kartṛtvamupapannamiti śabdenaivātra nāyakavyavahāra unnīto 'bhidhadheya eva,
GK16andhvc1u:4812: na vyaṅgya ityata eva samāsoktiḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4818: bālapriyā timirasya sūkṣmāṃśūnāṃ ca sammiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ karamatvasambhavāttayeti karaṇe tṛtīyetyāha---karaṇabhūtayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:4819: tanmiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ jñāpakatvarūpopalakṣaṇatvasambhavāt tayetyupalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā vetyāha-upalakṣaṇatvena veti /
GK16andhvc1u:4827: ata eva na labhitamiti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ bodhayitumāha---timiretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4841: evaṃ vyaṅgyasya guṇībhūtatvaṃ pradarśya rasāpekṣyā dhvanitvamapyastīti darśayintumāha--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4858: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgyaviseṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepoktisāmarthyādeva jñāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4859: tathāhi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣeṣa locanam gamyata iti cānenābhidhāvyāpāranirāsādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:4860: nāyikāyā nāyake yo vyavahāraḥ sa niśāyāṃ samāropitaḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:4861: nāyikāyāṃ nāyakasya yo vyavahāraḥ sa śaśini samāropita iti vyākhyāne naikaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4865: tatrādya.u yathā--- ahaṃ tvāṃ yadi nekṣeya kṣaṇamapyutsukā tataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4867: bālapriyā ityuktyanuguṇatayā rājahaṃsānāṃ cāmaratvaṃ śaradaścāmaragrāhiṇītvaṃ cārthāt sidhyati,
GK16andhvc1u:4868: tathā prakṛte timirāṃśukapadānuguṇatayā niśādernāyikātvādikamata ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4881: evaṃ samāsoktau vyaṅgyopaskṛtaṃ vācyameva pradhānamatastatra dhvanilakṣaṇasya nātivyāptiriti pradarśyākṣepe 'pi sa eva prakāra ityāha vṛtto-'ākṣepe 'pī' tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4894: pratiṣedha iva locanam iti vakṣyamāṇamaraṇaviṣayo niṣedhātmākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4896: uktaviṣayastu yathā mamaiva--- bho bhoḥ kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patitastvaṃ pāntha kānyā gatiḥ tattāddaktṛṣitasya me khalamatiḥ so 'yaṃ jalaṃ gūhate
GK16andhvc1u:4897: asthānopanatāmakālasulabhāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ prati krudhya bhoḥ trailokyaprathitaprabhāvamihimā mārgaḥ punarmāravaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4906: utsukāhaṃ tvāṃ kṣaṇamapi na tar ikṣeya yadi,
GK16andhvc1u:4907: tataḥ tarhi iyadetāvat yadiparyantaṃ vacanameva astu /
GK16andhvc1u:4924: bho bho iti vīpsayā bodhanīyaṃ pratyādarātiśayo dyotyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4927: kiṃ kiṃ patitaḥ atrāgamanena etatsevanena cābhimataṃ phalaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4929: cirasevinā kenacidevamukte pānthaḥ kiñcit kupita āha---kānyetyādi khaletyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:4931: tattādṛgatiśayena tṛṣitasya tṛṣā jalapipāsā dhanalipsā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4939: 'khalamatisso 'yam' iti pāṭhe tu so 'yamiti māravamārgaṃ prabhuṃ coddiśyoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4942: akālasulabhāṃ yadā viṣayasya sulabhatvaṃ tadā tṛṣṇā na bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:4944: tṛṣṇāṃ prati tava tṛṣṇāyai krudhya na māṃ pratīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4949: locanam atra kaścitsevakaḥ prāptaḥ prāptavyamasmātkimiti na labha iti pratyāśāviśasyamānahṛdayaḥ kenacidamunākṣepeṇa pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4954: yathā--- tasyāstanmukhamasti saumyasubhagaṃ kiṃ pārvaṇenenḍhunā saundaryasya padaṃ dṛśau yadi ca taiḥ kiṃ nāma nīlotpalaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4963: na labhe iti vitarkānantarajātayā pratyāśayā pratikṣaṇotpannayā āśayā viśasyamānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yasya sa iti pratibodhane hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4965: amunā ākṣepeṇa asatpuruṣasevātadvaiphalyādirūpavyaṅgyaviśeṣapratipipādayiṣayā kṛtena kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita iti niṣedharūpeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:4983: kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita itīṣṭapatanaphalaniṣedharūpākṣepemākṣepyaṃ yadasatpuruṣasevāvaiphalyādi tenālaṅkṛtamākṣepakaṃ tadvācyameva pradhānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4984: “prāṇā yena samarpitā” ityādivadatrāprastutapraśaṃsāpyastīti tatsaṅkīrṇo 'yamākṣepa ityapi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5001: rūpo ya ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgyaviśeṣamākṣipanmukhyaṃ kāvyaśarīram /
GK16andhvc1u:5004: locanam kiṃ vā komalakāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ satyeva tatrādhare hī dhātuḥ punaruktavasturacanārambheṣvapūrvā grahaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5006: kiṃ tena kṛtyamiti tvapahastanārūpa ākṣepo vācya eva camatkārakāraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5015: punaruktānāmanupādeyānāṃ niṣphalānāṃ vastūnāṃ pārvaṇacandrādīnāṃ racanāyāṃ sṛṣṭau viṣaye ye ārambhā vyāpārāḥ teṣu /
GK16andhvc1u:5022: 'iti vācya ākṣepa eva camatkārakāraṇam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5030: śaratkāle hi candrasya prasādātiśayo ravitāpādhikyaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5037: nāyikāpakṣe nakhakṣatasthatayā śrutamapyupamānatvamaindre dhanuṣiyojanīyamindracāpābhaṃ nakakṣataṃ dadhānetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5047: tatpurassaraḥ tasyāḥsa purassaraḥ pūrvakāle sammukhaṃ ca saranniti dvayorarthayoradhyavasāyenaikyaṃ bodhyamata evāho ityādeparupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5050: ddaṣṭāntoktitayā aho daivagatiḥ kīddaktathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5051: atra satyāmapi vyaṅgyapratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvamutkarṣavaditi tasyaiva prādhānyavivakṣā /
GK16andhvc1u:5052: yathā ca dīpakāpahnutyādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāvapi prādhānyenāvivikṣitatvānna tayā vyapadeśastadvadatrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5059: bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa tu samāsoktirityamumāśayaṃ hṛdaye gṛhītvā samāsoktyakṣepayoḥ yuktyedamekamevodāharaṇaṃ vyataradgranthakṛt /
GK16andhvc1u:5062: sarvathālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyaṃ vācye guṇībhavatīti naḥ sādhyamityatrāśayo 'tra granthe 'smadgurubhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5063: evaṃ prādhānyavivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntamuktvā vyapadeśo 'pi prādhānyakṛta eva bhavatītyatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ svaparaprasiddhamāha---yathā ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5067: dīpake hi 'ādimadhyāntaviṣayaṃ tridhā dīpakamiṣyate' iti lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5068: maṇiḥ śāṇollīḍhaḥ samaravijayī hetidalitaḥ kalāśeṣaścandra suratamṛditā bālalanā /
GK16andhvc1u:5069: madakṣīṇo nāgaḥ śaradi saridāśyānapulinā tanimnā śobhante galitavibhavāścārthiṣu janāḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5090: yathā--- neyaṃ virauti bhṛṅgālī madena mukharā muhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5096: yathā--- sa ekastrīṇi jayati jaganti kusumāyudhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5097: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam //
GK16andhvc1u:5099: uktanimittāyāmapi vastusvabhāvamātratve paryavasānamiti tatrāpi na vyaṅgyasadbhāvaśaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:5100: yathā--- karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimānyo jane jane /
GK16andhvc1u:5139: yasmādukte prakāradvaye vyaṅyasadbhāvo anuktanimittāyāmapi viśeṣoktau---- āhūto 'pi sahāyaiḥ omityuktvā vimuktanidro 'pi /
GK16andhvc1u:5140: gantumanā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
GK16andhvc1u:5142: na tu tatpratītinimittā locanam tena prakāradvayamavadhīrya tṛtīyaṃ prakāramāśaṅkate--anuktanimittāyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc1u:5146: yattu rasikairapi nimittaṃ kalpitam-'kāntāsamāgame gamanādapi laghutaramupāyaṃ svapnaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5147: manyamāno nidrāgamabuddhyā saṅkocaṃ nātyajat' iti tadapi nimittaṃ cārutvahetutayā
GK16andhvc1u:5149: api tu viśeṣoktibhāga eva na śithilayatītyevambhūto 'bhivyajyamānanimittopaskṛtaścārutvahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5151: evamabhiprāyadvayamapi sādhāraṇoktyā granthakṛnnyarūpayanna tvaudbhaṭenaivābhiprāyeṇa grantho vyavasthita iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5191: paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ tadbhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāvantarbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5194: locanam atra bhīṣmasya bhārgavaprabhāvabhibhāvī prabhāva iti yadyapi pratīyate,
GK16andhvc1u:5196: ata eva paryāyeṇa prakārāntareṇāvagamātmanā vyaṅgyenopalakṣitaṃ sadyadabhidhīyate tadabhidhīyamānamuktameva satparyāyoktamityabhidhīyata itilakṣaṇapadam,
GK16andhvc1u:5199: yadi tvabhidhīyata ityasya balādyvakhyānamabhidhīyate pratīyate pradānatayeti,
GK16andhvc1u:5215: 'ata eva iti sarvaṃ yujyata' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5216: vyaṅgyasya prādhānye sarvametadanupapannaṃ bhavedato vācyasyaiva prādhānyamabhyupeyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5228: anena lakṣaṇavākyenaiva vyaṅgyānugatasya vācyasya prādhānyaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5245: prādhānavyaṅgyānāṃ na punaḥ paryāyokte bhāmahodāhṛtasaddaśe vyaṅgyasyaiva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5247: apahnutidīpakayoḥ punarvācyasya locanam yāddaśo 'laṅkāratvena vivakṣitastāddaśe dhvanirnāntarbhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:5255: na ceyadapi prāktanairddaṣṭamapi tvasmābhirevonmīlitamiti darśayati-na punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:5256: bhāmahasya yāddaktadīyaṃ rūpabhimataṃ tāddagudāharaṇena darśatam. tatrāpi naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ cārutvāhetutvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5257: tena tadanusāritayā tatsaddaśaṃ yadudāharaṇāntaramapi kalpyate tatra naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamiti saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5260: kevalaṃ tu nayamanavalambyāpaśravamenātmasaṃskāra ityanāryaceṣṭitam. yadāhuraitihā sikāḥ---'avajñayāpyavacchādya śṛṇvannarakamṛcchati' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5261: bhāmahena hyudāhṛtam--- 'guheṣvadhvasu vā nānnaṃ bhuñjmahe yadadhītinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5276: mātsaryagrahaṇātkevalaṃ paryāyoktavācā ayamasmannaya evāvalambyata iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:5292: 'adhītinaḥ viprāḥ yadannaṃ na bhuñjate vayaṃ gṛheṣvadhvasu vā tadannaṃ na prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:5294: locanam etaddhi bhagavadvāsudevavacanaṃ paryāyema rasadānaṃ niṣedhati /
GK16andhvc1u:5296: na cāsya rasadānaniṣedhasya vyaṅgyasya kiñciccārutvamasti yena prādhānyaṃ śaṅgyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:5297: api tu tadyvaṅgyopodbalitaṃ viprabhojanena vinā yannabhojanaṃ tadevoktaprakāreṇa paryāyoktaṃ satprākaraṇikaṃ bhojanārthamalaṅkurute /
GK16andhvc1u:5298: na hyasya nirviṣaṃ bhojanaṃ bhavatviti vivakṣitamiti paryāyoktamalaṅkāra eveti cirantanānāmabhimata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5303: pūrvaṃ caitadupamādivyapadeśabhājanameva tadyathā na bhavatītyamuyā chāyayā dṛṣṭāntatayoktamapyuddeśakramapūraṇāya
GK16andhvc1u:5305: chāyāntarema vastu punarekamevopamāyā eva vyaṅgyatvena dhvanitvāśaṅkanāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5306: yattu vivaraṇakṛt---dīpakasya sarvatropamānvayo nāstīti bahunodāharaṇaprapañcenavicāritavāṃstadanupayogi nissāraṃ supratikṣepaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5316: bhojanaṃ nirviṣaṃ bhavatviti vā bhagavato 'bhiprāyassahṛdayānāṃ vyaṅgyo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5328: na vivakṣitaṃ caidyaṃ prata na bubodhayiṣitam /
GK16andhvc1u:5331: tīpakāpahnutyādāviti pūrvoktasyaivādyakathanena paunarukatyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ svarūpaikye 'pi prakārabhedānna paunaruktyamityāha---pūrvamityādi
GK16andhvc1u:5342: locanam sa priyāsaṅgamotkaṇṭhāṃ sāsahyāṃ manasaḥ śucam //
GK16andhvc1u:5346: tathā hi--- rāma iva daśaratho 'bhūddaśaratha iva radhurajo 'pi radhusaddaśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5349: tasmātkramikatvaṃ samaṃ vā prākaraṇikatvamupamāṃ niruṃṇaddhīti ko 'yaṃ trāsa itlaṃ gardabhīdohānuvartanena /
GK16andhvc1u:5352: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṅkaraḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5357: atra śaśī vadanamasyāḥ tadvadvā vadanamasyā iti rūpakopamollekhādyugapaddvayāsambhavādekatarapakṣatyāgagrahaṇe
GK16andhvc1u:5359: yo 'pi dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ---śabdārthālaṅkārāmāmekatrabhāva iti tatrāpi pratīyamānasya kā śaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:5360: yathā--smara smaramiva priyaṃ ramayase yamāliṅganāt iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5385: ko vyaṅgyaḥ ko vācya ityaniścayādvyaṅgyaprādānyakṛtadhvanitvasambhāvanāpi locanam atraiva yamakamupamā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5386: tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ-- yatraikatra vākyāṃśe 'neko 'rthālaṅkārastatrāpi dvayoḥ sāmyātkasya vyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:5398: tayā gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhyastato gahītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5410: svāmino vipattau satyāṃ samucitaṃ yadvratagrahaṇa tatra hevākī udyuktaḥ yaḥ kulaputrakaḥ tadrūpaṇaṃ vāsaraviṣayakaṃ karma /
GK16andhvc1u:5412: bhāsvatassvāmitvamatastadgamanasya vipattitvaṃ guhānivāsasya vratagrahamatvaṃ tatpraveśasya tadarthavyāpāratvañca tamoguhāmiti śābdena rūpakeṇa gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5424: atha vācyopasarjanībhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ tadā locanam tadāha-yadālaṅkāra ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5427: ādye tu prakāre 'śaśivadane'tyādyudāhṛte kathañcidasti sambhāvanetyāśacaṅkya nirākaroti---alaṅkāradvayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:5430: nanu yatra vyaṅgyameva prādhānyena bhāti tatra kiṃ kartavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5431: yathā--- hīi ṇa guṇāṇurāo khalāṇaṃ ṇavaraṃ pasiddhisaraṇāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5432: kira pahiṇusai sasimaṇaṃ cande piāmuhe diṭṭhe //
GK16andhvc1u:5436: saṅkarālaṅkāra bālapriyā asmiṃścaturthe bhede dhvanyabhāvaparatayā vṛttigranthamavatārayati---tadāheti /
GK16andhvc1u:5443: bhavati na guṇānurāgaḥ khalānāṃ kevalaṃ prasiddhiśaraṇānām /
GK16andhvc1u:5444: kila prasnaiti śaśimaṇiḥ candre na priyāmukhe dṛṣṭe //
GK16andhvc1u:5452: yadi śasimaṇergumānurāgassyāttadā priyāmukhadarśane kathaṃ na niḥṣyandeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5454: candraḥ priyāmukhameva candra ityarthasya khyāpanādapahnutiśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5459: na tu sa eva dhvaniriti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5461: api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktireva locanam evāyaṃ na bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:5464: atha sarveṣu saṅkaraprabhedeṣu vyaṅgyasambhāvanānirāsaprakāraṃ sādhāraṇamāha---api ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5474: tatra prathame prakāradvaye prastutāprastutayostulyameva prādhānyamiti pratijñāṃ karoti-aprastutetyādinā prādhānyamityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:5476: gamyate tu prākaraṇiko viśeṣaḥ sa ekaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5479: atra hi daivaprādhānyaṃ sarvatra sāmānyarūpamaprastutaṃ varṇitaṃ satprakṛte vastuni kvāpi vinaṣṭe viśeṣātmani paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc1u:5482: yadā tu viseṣo 'prākaramikaḥ prākaraṇikaṃ sāmānyamākṣipati tadā dvitīyaḥ bālapriyā tatkathamityatrāha--saṅkīrṇateti /
GK16andhvc1u:5508: sambandhastadā viśeṣapratītau satyāmapi prādhānyena tatsāmānyenāvinābhāvātsāmānyasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5509: yadāpi viśeṣasya sāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ tadāpi sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmanye sarvaviśeṣāṇāmantarbhāvādviśeṣasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5511: yathā--- etattasya mukhātkiyattakamalinīpattre kaṇaṃ pārthaso yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16andhvc1u:5512: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanai. statroṅḍīya gato hahetyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥ śucā //
GK16andhvc1u:5514: prastutaṃ tu jalabindau maṇitvasambhāvanaṃ viśeṣarūpaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5518: etameva nyāyaṃ nimittanaimittikabhāve 'tidiśaṃstasyāpi dviprakāratāṃ bālapriyā viśeṣaprādhānyanāntarīyakatvaṃ sāmānyaprādhānyasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5520: yathā 'raktaṃ paṭaṃ vaye'tyādau dvayostrayāṇaṃ vā vidhirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5526: muktāmaṇirityamasta yat etattasya jaḍasya kiyat vakṣyamāṇāpekṣayā atyalpamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5538: ādīyamāne aṅgulyagrasya laghukriyayā alpacācalanena pravlayini aṅguloveva lagra ityarthastathā sati /
GK16andhvc1u:5541: tasyādarśinānmamāyaṃ muktāmaṇiḥ khamutpatya gata iti matvā antaḥśucā na nidrātītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5545: yathā----- ye yāntyabhyudaye prītiṃ nojjhanti vyasaneṣu ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5547: atrāprastuta.ṃ suhṛdbāndhavarūpatvaṃ nimitt sajjanāsaktyā varṇayati naimittikīṃ śraddheyavacanatāṃ prastutāmātmano 'bhivyaṅktum;
GK16andhvc1u:5548: yatra naimittikapratītāvapi nimittapratītireva pradhānībhavatyanuprāṇākatveneti vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5549: kadācittu nemititakamaprastutaṃ varṇyamānaṃ satprastutaṃ nimittaṃ vyanakti /
GK16andhvc1u:5559: yathāsmadupādhyāyabhaṭṭendurājasya---- prāṇā yena samarpitāstava balādyena tvamutthāpitaḥ skandhe yasya ciraṃ sthito 'si vidadhe yaste saparyāmapi
GK16andhvc1u:5560: tasyāsya smitamātrakeṇa janayan prāṇāpahārakriyāṃ bhrātaḥ pratyupakāriṇāṃ dhuri paraṃ vetāla līlāyate //
GK16andhvc1u:5571: na hi vaktustathāvidhabāndhavatvādipratītiṃ vinā śraddheyavacanatvaṃ pratītipathamavatarediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5582: locanam atra yadyapi sārūpyavaśena kṛtadhnaḥ kaścidanyaḥ prastuta ākṣipyate,
GK16andhvc1u:5584: na hyacetanopālambhavadasambhāvyamāno 'yamartho na ca na hṛdya iti vācyasyātra pradhānatā /
GK16andhvc1u:5585: yadi punaracetanādinātyantāsambhāvyamānatadarthaviśeṣaṇenāprastutena varṇitena prastutamākṣipyamāṇaṃ camatkārakāri tadā vastudhvanirasau /
GK16andhvc1u:5586: yathā mamaiva---- bhāvavrāta haṭhājjanasya hṛdayānyākramya yannartayan bhaṅgībhirvividhābhirātmahṛdayaṃ pracchādya saṃkrīḍase /
GK16andhvc1u:5587: sa tvāmāha jaḍaṃ tataḥ sahṛdayammanyatvaduḥśikṣito manye 'muṣya jaḍātmatā stutipadaṃ tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt //
GK16andhvc1u:5590: lokena mūrkho 'yamiti yadavajñāyate tadā tadīyaṃ lokottaraṃ caritaṃ prastutaṃ bālapriyā
GK16andhvc1u:5602: atyantamasambhāvyamānāni tadarthasya aprastutārthasya viśeṣaṇāni yatra tena /
GK16andhvc1u:5606: bhāvānāṃ candrodyānādipadārthanāṃ vrātaḥ sārthaḥ he bhāva vrāta /
GK16andhvc1u:5613: yā jaḍātmatā jaḍo 'sītyucyamānatā sā tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt tvatsāmyāpātāddhetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5619: gāḍho yo viveka evālokaḥ tena tiraskṛtaṃ timirapratānaṃ mohāndhakārasamūho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5627: sa ca pratyuta kasyacidvirihiṇa autsukyacintādūyamānamānasatāmanyasya praharṣaparavaśatāṃ karotīti haṭhādeva lokaṃ yathecchaṃ vikārakāraṇābhirnartayati
GK16andhvc1u:5628: na ca tasya hṛdayaṅkenāpi jñāyate kīdṛgayamiti,
GK16andhvc1u:5629: pratyuta mahāgambhīro 'tividagdhaḥ suṣṭugarvahīno 'tiśayena krīḍācaturaḥ sa yadi lokena jaḍa iti tata eva kāraṇātpratyuta vaidagdhyasambhāvananimittātsambhāvitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5630: ātmā ca yata eva kāraṇātpratyuta jāḍyena sambhāvyastata eva sahṛdayaḥ sambhāvitastadasya
GK16andhvc1u:5631: lokasya jaḍo 'sīti yadyucyate tadā jaḍyamevaṃvidhasya bhāvavrātasyāvidagdhasya prasiddhamiti
GK16andhvc1u:5636: itarathaiva punaralaṅkārāntaratvamalaṅkāraviśeṣatvaṃ na vyaṅgyasya kathañcidapi prādhānya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5637: uddeśe yadādigrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ samāsoktītyatra dvandve tena vyājastutiprabhṛtiralaṅkāravargo 'pi sambhāvyamānavyaṅgyānuveśaḥ sambhāvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5667: tathā sati tattulyayogakṣematayā janasyāpyajaḍatvasambhavājjanaṃ pratijaḍo 'sītyuktirvāstavī stutireva paryavasyediti /
GK16andhvc1u:5673: tadayamatra saṅkṣepaḥ---- locanam tatra sarvatra sādhāraṇamuttaraṃ dātumupakramate---tadayamatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:5675: tatra vyājastutiryathā--- kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ paragṛhagataiḥ kintu nāhaṃ samartha- stūṇīṃ sthātuṃ prakṛtimukharo dākṣiṇātyasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5676: gehe gehe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pānagoṣṭhyā- munmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5678: yattūdāhṛtaṃ kenacit---- āsīnnātha pitāmahī tava mahī jātā tato 'nantaraṃ mātā samprati sāmburāśiraśanā jāyā kulodbhūtaye /
GK16andhvc1u:5679: pūrṇe varṣaśate bhaviṣyati punaḥ saivānavadyā snuṣā yuktaṃ nāma samagranītividuṣāṃ kiṃ bhūpatīnāṃ kule //
GK16andhvc1u:5688: yasya cittavṛttiviśeṣasya sambandhī vāgvyāpārādirvikāro 'pratibandho niyataḥ bālapriyā punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:5691: aprastutavarṇanasthale yatra vācyasya aprastutārthasya camatkārakāritvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:5693: yatra tu prastutasya vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ tatra vastudhvanireva nālaṅkāra iti granthakārāśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5704: 'yasya vikārastu apratibandhaḥ prabhavan yena hetunā tamabhiprāyaṃ tatpratibandhaṃ ca gamayati asau bhāva ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5712: na dhvaniryatra vā tasya prādhānyaṃ na pratīyate //
GK16andhvc1u:5713: locanam prabhavaṃstaṃ cittavṛttiviśeṣarūpamabhiprāyaṃ yena hetunā gamayati sa heturyatheṣṭopabhogyatvādilakṣaṇo 'rtho bhāvālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5714: yathā--- ekākinī yadabalā taruṇī tathāhamasmingṛhe gṛhapatiśca gato videśam /
GK16andhvc1u:5715: kaṃ yācase tadiha vāsamiyaṃ varākī śvaśrūrmamāndhabadhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha //
GK16andhvc1u:5716: atra vyaṅgyamekaikatra padārthe upaskārakārīti vācyaṃ pradhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:5717: vyaṅgyaprādhānye tu na kācidalaṅkārateti nirūpitamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:5728: 'yena pratibaddhena' iti pāṭhe tu pratibaddhenetyasyokta evārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5730: kasyaciccittavṛttiviśeṣasya anubhāvo vyāpārādirvyaṅgyahetudvārā taccittavṛttiviśeṣasya gamakaḥ sa heturityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5732: ahaṃ tvayā yatheṣṭamupabhoktavyā na kiñcitpratibandhakamiti nāyikāmanogatādirarthaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5737: nanvasti khalu tava śvaśrūstāṃ yāca ityatrāha-iyamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5752: 'na pratīyata' tatparāveva śabdārthau yatra vyaṅgyaṃ prīta sthitau /
GK16andhvc1u:5753: dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayo mantavyaḥ saṅkarojjhitaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5763: tena caturṣu prakāreṣu na dhvanivyavahāraḥ sadbhāve 'pi vyaṅgyasya aprādhānye mliṣṭapratītau vācyena samaprādhānye 'sphuṭe prādhānye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5775: tadāpi na sa bālapriyā ityasya vyakhyānam--sphuṭatayā na cakāstīti /
GK16andhvc1u:5791: vṛttāvitaścetyatra itaḥ vakṣyamāṇaddhetorityarthaṃ manasikṛtya vyācaṣṭe---na kevalamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5796: nanvavayavātiriktāvayavino 'nupalambhānna cāvayava evāvayavīti tanniṣedho 'nupapanna iti śaṅkāmavayava ityekavacanārthasya vivakṣitatvaṃ darśayan pariharati---ekaika iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5807: yatrāpi vā tattvaṃ tatrāpi dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameva /
GK16andhvc1u:5819: nanvalaṅkāra eva kaścittvayā pradhānatābhiṣekaṃ dattvā dhvanirityātmeti cokta ityāśaṅkyāha---yatrāpi veti /
GK16andhvc1u:5820: na hi samāsoktyādīnāmanyatama evāsau tathāsmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5821: tadviviktatve 'pi tasya bhāvāt samāsoktyādyalaṅkārasvarūpasya samastasyābhāve 'pi tasya darśitatvāt 'attā ettha' iti 'kassa vā ṇa' ityādi;
GK16andhvc1u:5824: vidvadbhya upajñā prathama upakramo yatyā ukteriti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5831: eka eva na samudāyaḥ na samudāyarūpāvayavī /
GK16andhvc1u:5847: dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadvivṛṇoti locane---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5859: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvaniriti vyavaharanti /
GK16andhvc1u:5862: śrotraśaṣkulīṃ santānenāgatā antyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyanta iti prakriyāyāṃ śabdajāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyamāṇā ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:5865: yathāha bhagavān bhartṛhariḥ--- yaḥ saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇairupajanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5869: tathā śrūyamāṇā ye varṇā nādaśabdavācyā antyabuddhinirgrāhyasphoṭābhivyañjakāste dhvaniśabdenoktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5886: saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇānāṃ sthānaissaha yassaṃyogo viyogaśca tābhyām /
GK16andhvc1u:5890: saḥ sphoṭa iti prathamamutpadyamānaḥ śabdaḥ sphoṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5895: yathoktaṃ vṛttikṛtā-'anityapakṣe sthānakaraṇaprāptivibhāgapūrvakaṃ prathamamebhirnirvṛtto yaśśabdaḥ sa sphoṭa ucyata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5897: ghaṇṭādernirhnādaḥ anuraṇanaṃ tatsthānīyastattulya iti vyaṅgyasya thadhvanipadena vyavahāryatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5898: nanvevaṃvyaṅgyaviśeṣasyaiva dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ bhavenna tu rasādestasyānuraṇanarūpatvavirahādityata āha--anuraṇaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:5900: atha vācakasya śabdasya vācyasyārthasya ca dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ prasādhasati---tathetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5903: antyeti pūrvapūrvavarṇānubhavajanitasaṃskārasahakṛtā yā antyavarṇabuddhiḥ tayā nirgrāhyaḥ nitarāṃ vyaktarūpema grāhyo yaḥ sphoṭaḥ tasyābhivyañjakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5914: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam //
GK16andhvc1u:5916: teṣu tāvatsveva śrūyamāṇeṣu vakturyo 'nyo drutāvilambitādivṛttibhedātmā prasiddāduccāraṇavyāpārādabhyadhikaḥ sa dhvaniruktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5917: yadāha sa eva--- śabdasyordhvamabhivyaktervṛttibhede tu vaikṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5922: tadyogācca samastamapi kāvyaṃ bālapriyā dhvaniprakāśite śabde viṣaye utpannaiḥ antarālavartibhiḥ pratyayai sphoṭaviṣayakāvyaktapratyayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5924: yathoktaṃ bhāṣye “vyaktarūpagrahamānuguṇā hyanupākhyeyākārā bahava upāyabhūtāḥ pratyayā dhvanibhiḥ prakāśyamāne śabde utpadyamānāśśabdasvarūpāvagrahe hetavo bhavanti” iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5932: varṇeṣu svarūpataḥ parimāṇaviśeṣavattayā sthiteṣu teṣu tathāvidheṣvevākhaṇḍatayā śrotrendriyaviṣayatāṃ gateṣu ca satsu ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5937: yadi vā, sakalaṃ varṇaṃ sphuṭaṃ gṛhṇāti vā;
GK16andhvc1u:5938: na tu kiñjitgrahaṇāgrahaṇe sambhavato varṇasya niravayavatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5943: śloko 'yaṃ mañjūṣāyāmitthaṃ vyākhyātaḥ-- śabdasya sphoṭasya abhivyakterūrdhvaṃ vaikṛtā dhvanayo jāyante iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5955: na caivaṃvidhasya dhvanervakṣyamāṇaprabhedatadbhedasaṅkalanayā mahāviṣayasya yatprakāśanaṃ tadaprasiddhālaṅkāraviśeṣamātrapratipādanena locanam dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5956: tena vyatirekāvyatirekavyapadeśo 'pi na na yuktaḥ vācyavācakasaṃmiśra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5959: tena vācyo 'pi dhvaniḥ vācako 'pi śabdo dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5970: vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sarvoṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānyarūpaḥ sādhāraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5990: tathā ca śabdātmā kāvyamiti vyapadeśyaścetyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6002: asminnarthe dhvaniriti bhāve pratyaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6013: tatra dhvanisvarūpe bhāvitaṃ praṇihitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ tena vā camatkakārarūpeṇa bhāvitamadhivāsitamata eva mukulitalocanatvādivikārakāraṇaṃ ceto yeṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6020: pañcadhāpi dhvaniśabdārthe yena yatra yato yasya yasmai iti bahuvrīhyarthāśrayeṇa yathocitaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ suyojyam /
GK16andhvc1u:6021: vācye 'rthe tu dhvanau vācyaśabdena svātmā tenāvivakṣito 'pradhānīkṛtaḥ svātmā yenetyavivaśritavācyo vyañjako 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6023: bālapriyā sāmānyarūpo vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇassamāna iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:6030: nanu kramaprāptaṃ bhāktatvādipakṣamapratisamādhāya vṛttikṛtā 'sa ce'tyādinā dhvanibhedapradarśanamanucitamityata āha---udāharaṇapṛṣṭa ityādi
GK16andhvc1u:6031: avivakṣitavācyādidhvanerudāharaṇe pradarśite tatra lakṣaṇāyāssamunmeṣādbhaktireva dhvaniriti śaṅkā susaṃpādā,
GK16andhvc1u:6034: atrānuktavavivakṣitavācyo va iti dvitīyodyotādāvanuvādo 'nupapannaḥ syādataḥ svayameva kārikākārasthāne sthitvetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6035: nanu pañjānāṃ dhvaniśabdārthānāṃ madhye kamarthamabhipretyāvivakṣitavācyo dhvanirityādisāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśa ityata āha--pañcadhāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6037: tatra vācakaḥ śabdo dhvanipadārtha iti pakṣe āvivakṣitaḥ vācyo yena śabdena /
GK16andhvc1u:6041: yasya yatsambandhitvena sa tathokta iti bahuvrīhirbodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6043: vāyyo dhvaniśabdārtha iti pakṣe viśeṣamāha---vācye 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6048: locana.m yadi vā karmadhārayeṇārthapakṣe avivakṣitaścāsau vācyaśceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6055: nanu ca vivakṣā cānyaparatvaṃ ceti viruddham /
GK16andhvc1u:6058: vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā hi tribhedo 'pi dhvanirubhābhyāmevābhyāṃ saṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6059: nanu tannāmapṛṣṭe etannāmaniveśanasya kiṃ phalam? ucyate--
GK16andhvc1u:6060: anena hi nāmadvayena dhvananātmani vyāpāre pūrvaprasiddhābhidhātātparyalakṣaṇātmakavyāpāratritayāvagatārthapratīteḥ pratipattṛgatāyāḥ prayoktrabhiprāyarūpāyāśca
GK16andhvc1u:6082: asti dhvaniḥ sa cetyādiśca nirdeśaḥ kimartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6085: tatra ca vyāpāre dvitīyasyāpi--- śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarottapaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6086: taruṇi yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:6087: locana.m tata eva padārthamabhidhāyānvayaṃ ca tātparyaśaktyāvagamayyaiva bādhakavaśena tamupahatya sāddaśyātsulabhasamṛddhisambhārabhājanatāṃ lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc1u:6088: tallakṣaṇāprayojanaṃ śūrakṛtavidyasevakānāṃ praśastyamaśabdavācyatvena gopyamānaṃ sannāyikākucakalaśayugalamiva mahārghatāmupayaddhvanyata iti
GK16andhvc1u:6092: na hi nirvidhnottamasiddhayo 'pi śrīparvatādaya imāṃ siddhiṃ vidadhyuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6098: vivakṣāyāśca sahakāritvaṃ darśitamiti tannāmabhyāṃ dhvanisvarūpameva projjīvitamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6114: atra nāmetyantasya kiyacciramityasya kimabhidhānamityasya ca dhvaniṃ krameṇāha---na hītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:6122: bhinnaṃ pṛthak locanam taveti bhinnaṃ padam /
GK16andhvc1u:6129: api tu rasajño 'ti tatprāptivadeva rasajñatāpyasya tapaḥ eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:6133: 'samāse vigalitatayā pratīyeta na pratīyatām' iti kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6142: yathā vā 'dhanavān sukhī'tyādilaukikavākye matubādyarthānvitasya dhanādeḥ prayojyatvādi sambandhena sukhādau cānvayaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6144: yataḥ śukaśābako 'yaṃ tvadadharāruṇyalābhasubhagambhāvukaṃ bimbaphalaṃ tvatsambandhitayā daśati,
GK16andhvc1u:6149: niravaśeṣeṇopabhoge sati hi prabandavicchedo bhavettathā netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6151: sa hi rasāsvādavārtānabhijño niravaśeṣameva bhojyadravyaṃ bhuṅkte /
GK16andhvc1u:6156: ucite kāle lābhaḥ bimbaphalatadāsvādalābhaḥ tapasa eva taporūpahetoreva /
GK16andhvc1u:6159: locanam atra ca traya eva vyāpārāḥ---abhidhā tātparyaṃ dhvananaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6164: kevalaṃ pūrvatra lakṣaṇaiva pradhānaṃ dhvananavyāpāre sahakāri /
GK16andhvc1u:6169: tena dvitīye 'pi bhede catvāra eva vyāpārāḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:6171: tasya khyāpanārthaṃ yadvaidagdhyena aucityāparityāgena cāṭuviracanaṃ uktarūpaṃ tadātmakaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:6172: taddvārakaṃ vibhāvasya ratyālambanabhūtasya taruṇīlakṣaṇasya uddīpanaṃ svābhiprāyānuguṇatayā
GK16andhvc1u:6181: asau śukaśābaka ityanena kāmukaḥ kaścidyuvā adharapāṭalaṃ bimbaphalaṃ daśatītyanenādharāsvādanādikañca sāddaśyāllakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6194: nanvevaṃrītyā vivakṣitānyaparavācye sarvatrāpi kiṃ lakṣaṇāsti? netyāha---
GK16andhvc1u:6200: yasmāt dvitīye 'pi prabhede śikhiriṇītyādau kvaciccatvāro vyāpārāḥ tasmādevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6201: tatra bhaktirūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā abhāve bhakterdhvanitvaśaṅkāparihārayostadānantaryaṃ tattadaśliṣṭaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6202: 'bhaktyā bibhartī'yādeḥ 'sā tu syādupalakṣaṇa'mityantagranthasya bhāvaṃ pradarśayannavatārayati--ayaṃ bhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6207: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvam rūpa-bhedād ayaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6208: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvaṃ rūpabhedādayaṃ dhvaniḥ ayamuktaprāro dhvanirbhaktyā naikatvaṃ bibharti bhinnarūpatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6209: vācyavyatiriktasyārthasya vācyavācakābhyāṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśaṃ yatra vyaṅgyaprādhānye sa dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6211: locanam prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti--- bhaktyā bibhartiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6212: uktaprakāra iti pañcasvartheṣu yojyam---śabde 'rthe vyāpāre vyaṅgye samudāye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:6234: tamatilaṅdhya tatsambaddhe 'nyasminnarthe tasya śabdasya vyavahāro 'tiśayito vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6240: tasyāḥ prayojanaṃ santāpasya sphuṭatayā pratipattiriti dhvananavyāpāro mukhyavṛttiparityāgānyathānupapattirūpayā vastusthityā sambhavannapītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:6243: nanu prayojanaviṣayatvādeva tasyādriyamāṇatvamavaśyambhāvīti kathamasatkalpatvamiti śaṅkāyāṃ tadvyāpāraviṣayasya na mukhyaṃ prayojanatvaṃ tallakṣaṇāsamanvayāt,
GK16andhvc1u:6247: ativyāpter athāvyāpter na cāsau lakṣyate tayā // DhvK_1.14 //
GK16andhvc1u:6252: yatra hi vyaṅgyakṛtaṃ mahatsauṣṭavaṃ nāsti tatrāpyupacaritaśabdavṛttyā prasidydhanurodhapravartitavyabahārāḥ locanam hi prayojanalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:6253: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāstīti kathaṃ dhvananaṃ lakṣaṇā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6257: nanu dhvananamavaśyambhāvīti kathaṃ tadvyatirikto 'sti viṣaya ityāha---mahatsauṣṭhavamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:6258: ata eva prayojanasyānādaraṇīyatvādvyañjakatvena na kṛtyaṃ kiñciditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6261: nanu prayojanābhāve kathaṃ tathā vyavahāra ityāha---prasiddhyanurodheti /
GK16andhvc1u:6266: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ----yadi bhaktirdhvaniścaikaṃ tatvaṃ syāttadā hyudāhṛte viṣaye dhvanisadbhāvo lakṣaṇāyā abhāvo vā syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6298: yathā--- parimlānaṃ pīnastanajadhanasaṅgādubhayata- stanormadhyasyāntaḥ parimilanamaprāpya haritam /
GK16andhvc1u:6299: idaṃ vyastanyāsaṃ ślathabhujalatākṣepavalanaiḥ kṛśāṅgyāḥ santāpaṃ vadati bisinīpatraśayanam //
GK16andhvc1u:6301: viramia puṇo ramijjai pio jaṇo ṇatthi punaruttam //
GK16andhvc1u:6303: viramya punā ramyate priyo jano nāsti punaruktam //
GK16andhvc1u:6306: jaha gahio taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchintamahilāo //
GK16andhvc1u:6308: uttānenāpi rūpeṇa tatprayojanaṃ cakāsannigūḍhatāṃ nidhānavadapekṣata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6311: gūḍhatayā varṇane vā kiṃ bālapriyā paramatarītyā prasiddhiśabdaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate---vayantviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6312: prasiddhiḥ prayojanasya prakarṣeṇa prakaṭatayā siddhiḥ pratītiḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:6319: nanu dhvanisthale 'pi prayojanasya sphuṭāvabhāsamānatvādanigūḍhatvaṃ samānamiti śaṅkāyāṃ viśeṣamāha---uttānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6332: ajjāeṃ pahāro ṇavaladāe diṇṇo pieṇa thaṇavaṭṭe /
GK16andhvc1u:6333: miuo vi dūsaho vvia jāo hiae savattīṇam // .//
GK16andhvc1u:6335: mṛduko 'pi duḥsaha iva jato hṛdaye sapatnīnām // .//
GK16andhvc1u:6342: yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ // .//
GK16andhvc1u:6345: tathā--ajjeti kaniṣṭhabhāryāyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe navalatayā kāntenocitakrīḍāyogena mṛduko
GK16andhvc1u:6346: 'pi prahāro dattaḥ sapatnīnāṃ saubhāgyasūcakaṃ tatkrīḍāsaṃvibhāgamaprāptānāṃ hṛdaye
GK16andhvc1u:6356: ubhayataḥ dvayorbhāgayoḥ kṣepā śayyāprānteṣu nipātanāni valanāni vivartanāni ca /
GK16andhvc1u:6358: atra śayanasyācetanasya mukhyārthavacanakartṛtvānvayānupapatyā mukhyārthabādhena jñāpanaṃ sāddaśyāllakṣyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6376: tathā---- parārthe yaḥ pīḍābhanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarvoṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6377: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:6382: anyasya datto mṛṭuḥ praddāro 'nyasya ca sampadyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6387: tathāpyaprastute ikṣau praśasyamāne pīḍāyā anubhavanenāsambhavatā pīḍāvattvaṃ lakṣyate;
GK16andhvc1u:6389: nanvastyatra prayojanaṃ tatkimiti na dhvanyata ityāśaṅkyāha---na caivaṃvidha iti // 14 //
GK16andhvc1u:6391: yadvā--ucitāyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ yo yogaḥ sambhavettena hetunā /
GK16andhvc1u:6393: 'sapatnīnāṃ dussaho jāta' ityatra gamyaṃ hetuṃ viśeṣaṇadvārā darśayati---saubhāgyetyādyaprāptānāmityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:6396: mṛdossusahatayā mṛdurapi dussaha ityanyaśca virodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6397: atra mukhyārthasya dānasya bādhātprahāro datta ityatra dānena dānasādhyaṃ phalavatvaṃ lakṣyata ityāha---dānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6425: śabdo vyañjakatāṃ bibhrad dhvany-ukter viṣayībhavet // DhvK_1.15 //
GK16andhvc1u:6430: rūḍhā ye viṣaye 'nyatra śabdāḥ sva-viṣayād api /
GK16andhvc1u:6431: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktās te na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // DhvK_1.16 //
GK16andhvc1u:6433: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktāste na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // 16 //
GK16andhvc1u:6435: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye kvacitsambhavannapi locanam yata uktyantareṇeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6441: evaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ sadapi nādarāspadaṃ tatra ko dhvananavyāpāra ityuktvā yatra mūlata eva prayojanaṃ nāsti,
GK16andhvc1u:6443: lāvaṇyādyā ye śabdāḥ svaviṣayāllavaṇarasayuktatvādeḥ svārthādanyatra hṛdyatvādau rūḍhā;
GK16andhvc1u:6460: tadiha mukhyārthabādhatadyogaprayojanatrayasānnidhyāpekṣaṇarūpavyavadhānaśūnyatvaṃ rūḍhaśabdena darśitamiti prayojanarāhityamatra vyavatiṣṭhata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6466: te tasmin svaviṣayādanyatra prayuktā api na dhvaneḥ padaṃ bhavanti;
GK16andhvc1u:6474: na cātra prayojanaṃ kiñciduddiśya lakṣaṇā pravṛtteti na tadviṣayo dhvananavyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6482: anurodhī virodhī tulya iti lokaprasiddho 'rtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6484: pustake dṛśyamānāyā 'devaḍi'tyādigāthāyā granteṣu tatra tatrākṣarabhedā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc1u:6485: ataścāsyāḥ svarūpaṃ chāyāṃ ca niścetuṃ na śaknomi /
GK16andhvc1u:6496: yad uddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhalad-gatiḥ // DhvK_1.17 //
GK16andhvc1u:6498: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc1u:6499: locanam tadā bhaktisannidhau sarvatra dhvanivyavahāraḥ syādityativiyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6500: abhyupagabhyāpi brūmaḥ--bhavatu yatra yatra bhaktistatra tatra dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6501: tathāpi yadviṣayo lakṣaṇāvyāpāro na tadviṣayo dhvananavyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6506: na ca tadviṣayo 'pi dvitīyo lakṣaṇāvyāpāro yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6508: mukhyāṃ vṛttimabhidāvyāpāraṃ parityajya parisamāpya guṇavṛttyā lakṣaṇārūpayārthasyāmukhyasya darśanaṃ pratyāyanā,
GK16andhvc1u:6513: vadatītyādau lāvaṇyādiśabde ca bhaktessatve 'pi dhvanyabhāvasya darśitatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6525: nanvabhidhāmantarema lakṣaṇāvṛtterasambhavāttatparityāgaḥ kathamityataḥ parityajyeti padaṃ prakṛtānuguṇatayā vyācaṣṭe--parisamāpyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6531: tatra hi cārutvatiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣame prayojane kartavye yadi locanam prayojane tāvaddvitīyo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6533: yataḥ skhalantī bādakavyāpāreṇa vidhurīkriyamāṇā gatiravabodhanaśaktiryasya śabdasya tadīyo vyāpāro lakṣaṇā /
GK16andhvc1u:6536: tenāyaṃ lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyā na viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6550: 'naca lakṣaṇaive'tyatra hetutvena kārikāntyapādaṃ pāta yati---yata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6551: tathā ca 'naiva skhaladgati'rityanena lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6574: lakṣitena tīrādinā lakṣaṇayā prayojanarūpārthaḥ pratyāyyata iti kecit;
GK16andhvc1u:6581: yathā---“ā hanta kimidaṃ tanvi netrayoḥ śrāvaṇastava /
GK16andhvc1u:6587: tatra śravamādipadenāśrupātādireva lakṣyata ityato lakṣitalakṣaṇāyā abhāvādayanna tadviṣaya ityartha iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:6590: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthalakṣaṇe prayojane' śabdasyāmukhyatā tadā tasya prayoge duṣṭataiva syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6594: prayojanāvagamasya sukhasampattye hi sa śabdaḥ prayujyate tasminnamukhyārthe /
GK16andhvc1u:6595: yadi ca 'siṃho vaṭuḥ' iti śauryātiśaye 'pyavagamayitavye skhaladgatitvaṃ śabdasya tarhi tatparatītiṃ naiva kuryāditi kimarthaṃ tasya prayogaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:6596: upacārema kariṣyatīti cettatrāpi prayojanāntaramanveṣyaṃ tatrāpyupacāra ityanavasthā /
GK16andhvc1u:6598: tarhi prayojane 'vagamayitavye na lakṣaṇākhyo vyāpāraḥ tatsāmagryabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6604: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣaṇa' iti pāṭhe tu kartavya ityasyotpādayitavye ityevārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6605: prayojane bodhye skhaladgatitvasya niṣedhānnāmukhyatāpadena tadeva vivakṣitamityāha---bādhakenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6607: duṣṭatvaṃ hi vyākaraṇasaṃskārarāhityādirūpamiti śaṅkāyāṃ pratipipādayiṣitārthapratītyajanakatvena vaiyarthyam;
GK16andhvc1u:6619: atha prayojane dhvananavyāpāraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan uktamevārthaṃ śaṅkāparihārābhyā pradarśayannāha---upacāreṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6626: tasmin prayojane 'pi upacāre pūrvavadaṅgīkārye tatrāpyanyadevaṃ tatrāpyanyadityanavasthā mūlakṣayakāriṇī syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6627: ataḥ skhaladgatitvābhyupagamo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6629: tathāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ kuta ityata āha---athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6634: tena yataḥ skhaladgateśśabdasya vyāpāro lakṣaṇā, tato hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6638: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
GK16andhvc1u:6644: na ca prayoge duṣṭatā kācit prayojanasyābidhnenaiva pratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6645: tenābhidhaiva mukhye 'rthe bādhakena pravivitsurnirudhyamānā satī acaritārthatvādanyatra prasarati /
GK16andhvc1u:6650: tato hetorvācakatvamabhidhāvyāpāramāśritā tadbādhanenotthānāttatpucchabhūtatvāccha guṇavṛttiḥ gauṇalākṣaṇikakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6655: evam 'ativyāpteratāvyāpterna cāsau lakṣyate tayā' iti kārikāgatātivyāptiṃ vyākhyāyāvyāptiṃ vyācaṣṭe---avyāptirapyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6665: bādhakenetyanantaraṃ vidhurīkṛteti ca kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6668: yathā pravāhādikamuddiśya gaṅgādiśabdasyāyaṃ mukhyārtha iti vyavahāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6670: tathā ca dvayorarthatvaṃ tulyaṃ mukhyatvāmukhyatvakṛta eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6674: na he śabdasya yaḥ kaścidevāṃmukhyo 'rthaḥ kintvayamartho 'sya śabdasyāmukhya iti niyata evetyatastathāvidhopadeśarūpasya /
GK16andhvc1u:6675: ayamartho 'smācchabdādboddhavya iti icchārūpasya vā saṅketasya grahamamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6679: tasmādityasiya kīrukayī sambandhaṃ darsayaṃstatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6683: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyante;
GK16andhvc1u:6685: locanam yatra yatra dhvanistatra tatra yadi bhaktirbhavenna syādavyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6689: kevalaṃ śabdastamarthaṃ lakṣayitvā tenaiva saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhajate-'siṃho baṭuḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6690: artho vārthāntaraṃ lakṣayitvā svavācakena tadvācakaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:6691: śabdārthau vā yugapattaṃ lakṣayitvā anyābhyāmeva śabdārthābhyāṃ miśrībhavata ityevaṃ lākṣaṇikādgauṇasya bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6703: 'śikhariṇī'tyādau sā pravartata eveti tatra tadabhāvābhidhānamasaṅgatamiti pūrvapakṣamabhyupetya
GK16andhvc1u:6709: nanvevaṃ gauṇasya lākṣaṇikādbhedaḥ kuta ityata āha--'kevalam' ityādinā 'bheda' ityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:6734: dvirephaśabdasya hi yo 'bhidheyo bhramaraśabdaḥ dvau rekau yasyeti kṛtvā tena bhramaraśabdena yasya saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ ṣaṭpadalakṣaṇasyārthasya so 'rtho dvirephaśabdena lakṣyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6738: vaiparītyāt yathā--śatrumuddiśya kaścidbravīti--'kimivopakṛtaṃ na tena mama' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6780: tathāhi-vibhāvānubhāvapratipādeke kāvye mukhye 'rthe tāvadbādhakānu praveśo 'pyasambhāvya iti ko lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6783: iha cābhidheyānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvādīnāmavinābhūtā rasādaya iti lakṣyante,
GK16andhvc1u:6788: dhūmaśabdasya svārthaviśrāntatvānna tāvati vyāpāra iti cet,
GK16andhvc1u:6798: vṛttau vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśabdena tadavāntarabhedo mukhyo 'saṃlakṣyakramo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6803: atrāpi lakṣaṇā kinna syādata āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6808: asti vā nāsti veti cintitayā mukhyārthabādhayā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6812: abhidheyenāvinābhūtasya kenāpi sambandhena sambaddhasya pratītirjñānaṃ taddheturvā /
GK16andhvc1u:6833: locanam nanvevaṃ dhūmāvagamanānantarāgnismaramavadvibhāvādipratipatyanantaraṃ ratyādicittavṛttipratipattarit śabdavyāpāra evātra nāsti /
GK16andhvc1u:6834: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pratītisvarūpajño mīmāṃsakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ--kimatra paracittavṛttimātre pratipattireva rasapratipattirabhimatā bhavataḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6837: yastvalaukikacamatkārātmā rasāsvādaḥ kāvyagatavibhāvādicarvaṇāprāṇo nāsau smaraṇānumānādisāmyena khilīkārapātrīkartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6838: kiṃ tu laukikena kāryakāraṇānumānādinā saṃskṛtahṛdayo vibhāvādikaṃ pratipadyamāna eva na tāṭasthyena pratipadyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6845: 'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityatra gaṅgāśabdo netyatra mukhyārthabādha eva heturatasya eva lakṣaṇābījamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6846: tarhihāpi mukhyārthabādho lakṣaṇā ca syat netyāha - na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6848: vibhāvādipratītyanantarabhāvinī ratyādipratītirdhūmādipratītijanyāgnyādismṛtisamānaiveti sā śabdavyāpārajanyā na bhavati dūre tasyā vyañjanājanyatvamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:6854: dvitīye rasapratīteritarapratītivailakṣṇyena dṛṣṭāntābhāvo doṣa ityāśayena sopahāsaṃ pṛcchannāha--idamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6879: tene saṃskṛtahṛdaya ityanena tatsaṃskāro 'pi pratipattuḥ rasapratītāvupayogīti darśitam /
GK16andhvc1u:6890: na cāsau carvaṇā pramāṇāntarato jātā pūrvaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6895: yadāha--'vibhāvo vijñānārthaḥ loke kāraṇamevābhidhīyate na vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6900: ata eva parakīyā na cittavṛttirgamyata ityabhiprāyeṇa 'vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ' iti sūtre sthāyigrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:6910: sahṛdayānāṃ yattattaccittavṛttitanmayībhavanaṃ tasyocitā yā carvaṇā arthādvibhāvādeḥ tatprāṇatayā tadupayogitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6920: viśiṣṭatayā bhāvyante jñāyante sthāyivyabhicāriṇo 'neneti vibhāvaḥ pramadodyānādiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6924: cittavṛttihetuṣu loke kāramamityeva vyavahāro na tu vibhāva itītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6933: kintu tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sthāyyādirūpāṇāṃ sambandhi yatsāmājikānāṃ tanmayībhavanaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6936: ata eva yasmādanubhavanamuktarūpameva na parakīyacittavṛtyanumitimātraṃ tasmāddhetorevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6942: vyabhicārī tu cittavṛttyātmatve 'pi mukhyacittavṛttiparavaśa eva carvyata iti vibhāvānubhāvamadhye gaṇitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6950: bālapriyā iti ṣaṣṭhyantasthāyigrahame kartavye 'pyanubhāvagrahaṇenaiva sthāyipratītirbhavatīti tanna kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6956: nanvevaṃ 'sthāyī raso bhavatī'tyādi tatra tatra sūtrakārādivacanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭetetyata āha--sthāyinastviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6959: tasya paragatasthāyinaḥ sambandhino ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ taducitāyāścittavṛttessahṛdayātmani yassaṃskārastasyodbodhena sundaracarvaṇāyā udayādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:6960: uktañca kāvyānuśāsanavyākhyāne 'aucityantu tatsthāyigatatvena kāraṇāditayā prasiddhānāmadhunā carvaṇopayogitayā vibhāvāditvālambanādi'ti /
GK16andhvc1u:6962: rasacarvaṇā hi hṛdayasaṃvādapurassarī hṛdayasaṃvāde ca nidānaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6964: tasyāñcāvasthāyāṃ pramadādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pulakādibhiḥ kāryaiśca bhūyo bhūyo 'vadhṛtasvakāraṇavyāptikaiḥ sthāyino ratyāderavagamo bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:6966: nanu cittavṛttitvāviśeṣātsyāyīva vyabhicāryapi sūtre grahaṇaṃ nārhatītyata āha---vyabhicārītviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6967: vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyicittavṛttiṃ prati guṇatvena vibhāvādiprāyatvāttanmadhye sa nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6972: yathoktamabhinavabhāratyāṃ “kathantarhi sūtre niṣpattiriti neyaṃ rasasyāpi tu tadviṣayarasānāyāḥ tanniṣpattyā yadi tadekāyattajīvitasya rasasya
GK16andhvc1u:6976: prabandhena pravṛttaṃ yadbandhusamāgamādikāraṇaṃ tenoditā yā harṣādilaukikacittavṛttiḥ tasyā nyagbhāvena adhaḥkaraṇena tadvyatirekeṇeti yāvat
GK16andhvc1u:6982: yathā vā daṇḍavakrādīnāmutpādanaṃ vyāpārastathā locanam nanu yadi neyaṃ jñaptirna vā niṣpattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6990: yata eva na dṛṣṭaṃ tata evālaukikamityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:7001: hi tadeva kāvyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ bālapriyā vibhāvādīnāṃ na jñāpanaṃ na vā utpādanaṃ vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7010: nanu jñāpakatvasya kārakatvasya vā abhāve vibhāvādīnāṃ rasapratītyarthamupādānaṃ vyarthaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:7013: vibhāvādestu tadabhāve 'pi carvaṇopayogitvānnānarthakayamityāśayena pariharati---na jñāpaka ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7025: nanvevamalaukikatve rasasya tatsādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:7032: vācakaśabdaikagamyatve hi rasasya vācyārthavallaukikatvaṃ kathañcicchakyaśaṅkamanuprāsādināpi vācakatvaśūnyena vyaṅgyatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc1u:7033: na cānuprāsavyaṅgyaṃ vastu loke dṛṣṭacaramato 'pi rasasyālaukikatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7038: abhidhāyā evābhāve tatpṛṣṭhavartinyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ prasaṅga eva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7040: kāvyātmako 'nuprasādiviśiṣṭo yaḥ locanam paṭhaṃścarvyamāṇaśca sahṛdayo lokaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:7042: tatra 'upādāyāpi ye heyā' iti nyāyena kṛtapratītikasyānupayoga eveti śabdasyāpīha dhvananavyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7054: yadeva kāvyaṃ paṭhitañcarvitañca tadeva punaḥ punaḥ paṭyate carvyate cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7064: so 'yaṃ nyāyo 'tra na pravartata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7068: yadyarthaṃpratītivyavadhānāpekṣayaiva śabdasya vyañjakatvaṃ bhavettadāvaśyaṃ kramo lakṣyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7074: tattadarthe tattatpadasya yassamayaḥ saṅketaḥ tadbalena tattatsaṅketagrahaṇasahakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7090: vākyārtha ekaḥ syāt vākyārthe bhedo nāṅgīkriyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7094: viramya yo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya tadayogo yataḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:7100: locanam niyamābhāva iti tena “agrihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ” iti śrutau khādecchvāmāṃsamityeṣa nārtha ityatra kā prameti prasajyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7101: tatrāpi na kācidiyattetyanāśvāsatā ityevaṃ vākyabhedo dūṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:7102: iha tu vibhāvādyeva pratipādyamānaṃ carvaṇāviṣayatonmukhamiti samayādyupayogābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7106: iha tu vibhāvādicarvaṇādbhutapuṣpavattatkālasāraivoditā na tu pūrvāparakālānubandhinīti laukikādāsvādādyogiviṣayāccānya evāyaṃ rasāsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7107: ata eva 'śikhariṇa' ityādāvapi bālapriyā samayādiriti pāṭhe sa eva yena pūrvamartho buddhaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7126: kāvyavyatariktaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca vākyaṃ samayaprakaraṇādisahakṛtaṃ yugapatkrameṇa vā ekamarthameva pratipādayatītyato 'nekārthabodhakatvena vākyabhedo naiva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:7127: samayaprakaraṇādyapekṣāṃ vinā vākyasyārthabodhakatvāṅgīkāre cāvyavasthitārthakatvenābodhakatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ syādityevaṃ vākyabhedo doṣa iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7139: ataśca tāṃ prati samayāderanapekṣaṇe 'pi nāvyavasthitārthakatvena doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7143: taduttarakāle tu kṛtārtho 'smīti ca pratītiḥ śāstrato jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7153: tatkālaḥ vartamānakāla eva sāro yasyāḥ saiva /
GK16andhvc1u:7157: yato rasāsvādasya kasyaciddhvanibhedasya sā tu syādupalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:7159: locanam mukhyārthabādhādikramamanapekṣyaiva sahṛdayā vaktabhiprāyaṃ cāṭuprītyātmakaṃ saṃvedayante /
GK16andhvc1u:7160: ata eva grandhakāraḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau bhakterabhāvamabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc1u:7163: yadi tu na kupyate 'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ' ityādāvavivakṣitavācye 'pi mukhyārthabādhādilakṣaṇāsāmagrīmanapekṣyaiva vyaṅgyārthaviśrāntirityalaṃ bahunā
GK16andhvc1u:7165: nanu mā bhūddhvaniriti bhaktiriti caikaṃ rūpam /
GK16andhvc1u:7175: tadupalakṣaṇamukhena ca dhvanimapi bālapriyā uktavidhamanitarasādhāraṇaṃ saubhāgyaṃ tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7180: tarhi kuto bhavataiva lakṣaṇāmabhyupetya vyākhyātamityata āha--asmābhistviti /
GK16andhvc1u:7184: nanu kasya nāma kopastattvaṃ kathyatāmityatrāha---yadi tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:7196: upalakṣaṇaṃ vastu sarvatra na bhavatīti sampratipannamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7202: dhvanilakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ lakṣaṇaphalasyetaravyāvṛttatayā dhvanijñānasyopalakṣaṇabhūtayā bhakatyaiva samabhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7208: yadi ca guṇavṛttyaiva dhvanirlakṣyata ityucyate tadabhidhāvyāpāreṇa taditaro 'laṅkāravargaḥ samagra eva lakṣyata iti pratyekamalaṅkārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:7210: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
GK16andhvc1u:7214: sa ca prāgeva saṃsiddha ityayatnasampannasamīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7215: ye 'pi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyamanākhyeyameva dhvanerātmānamāmnāsiṣuste 'pi na parikṣya vādinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7220: tathā hetubalātkāryaṃ jāyata iti tārkikairukte kimidānīmiśvaraprabhṛtīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ jñātṝṇāṃ vā kṛtyamapūrvaṃ syāditi sarvo nirārambhaḥ syāt
GK16andhvc1u:7228: ata eva mūlakārikā sākṣāttannirākaraṇārthā na śrūyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7229: vṛttikṛttu nirākṛtamapi prameyaśayyāpūraṇāya kaṇṭhena bālapriyā abhidhāvyāpāre /
GK16andhvc1u:7233: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvasya samastālaṅkāravyāpakatvāttasya cābhidhāvayāpārajīvitatvāttannirūpaṇe kṛte satyalaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ tadgranthakārāṇāṃ niṣphalameva bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7245: nanu kārikākāreṇa itarapakṣa ivālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣaḥ kimiti na pratikṣipta iti śaṅkāṃ pariharan 'ye 'pī'tyādigranthamavatārayati---evamityādi
GK16andhvc1u:7248: na ca tasyālakṣaṇīyatve tatsambhavati iti tannirākaraṇanāntarīyakatvenālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣo 'pi nirākṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7249: nanu tarhi kimiti vṛttikṛtā tatpakṣo 'nūdya nirākṛta ityata āha---vṛttikṛditi /
GK16andhvc1u:7251: prameyasya śayyā sanniveśaviśeṣaḥ yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yadyanākhyeyatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva vastūnāṃ tatprasaktam /
GK16andhvc1u:7252: yadi punardhvanerātiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ locanam tatpakṣamanūdya nirākaroti---ye 'pītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:7253: uktayā nītyā 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:7254: vakṣyamāṇayā tu nītyā viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati 'arthāntare saṅkramitaṃ ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:7255: tatra prathamoddyote dhvaneḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇameva kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:7256: dvitīyoddyote kārikākāro 'vāntaravibhāgaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca vidadhadanuvādamukhena mūlavibhāgaṃ dvividhaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:7260: yathā 'tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi sphuranti' itivadatiśayoktyānākhyeyatoktā sārarūpatāṃ pratipādayitumiti darśitamiti śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:7262: anākhyeyatvapakṣasyāpi svayamanirākaraṇe tatpūraṇaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:7263: uktayā nītyetyādau yathāsaṃkhyena sambandha ityāśayenopapādayati---yatrārtha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7266: vṛttau 'sa ca dvividha' ityādinā viśeṣalakṣaṇakathanaṃ kārikākārāśayānusāreṇetyāha--tatra prathamodyota ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7270: kintvatiśayittvāditi cettarhi tadabhidhānaṃ yuktamevetyāha vṛttau---'yadi punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:7281: atra te 'pītyapiśabdena svasyāpi sarvatra yuktabhidhāyitvaṃ granthakṛtā sūcitamiti ca bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:7283: “nidrārdhamīlitaddaśo madamantharāṇi nāpyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni adyāpi me mṛgaddaśo madhurāṇi tasyāḥ” ityādyapādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:7292: locana.m kiṃ locanaṃ vināloko bhāti candrikayāpi hi /
GK16andhvc1u:7306: api kiṃ bhāti kiṃ sphurati na pratyakṣaviṣayo bhavatītyaprastutārthaḥ tatsāmyaṃ cātra dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:7319: atha ca yasyāḥ pratibhāyāḥ unmīlanayuktyā prakāśayogena /
GK16andhvc1u:7320: viśvam kṣaṇādunmīlati navanavatayā bhāti svātmanyevāyatane viśrāntāṃ vāsanārūpeṇāvasthitām,
GK16andhvc1u:7323: vande ityādyartho 'pi bodhya iti sarvaṃ śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:7324: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ mandaḥ kvāhaṃ tena mayā kṛtā /
